title: Value for money, needs some repairs in room's bathroom
desc: I chose this hotel because of its location and fair price compared to other hotels in Orchard area. Rooms are clean but needs renovation since it looked old fashioned. Need some repairs in room's bathroom because granite near washbasin is cracked.

title: Good location for a good price
desc: I stayed couple of days in this hotel recently. I have stayed in this hotel couple of years before as well. The hotel is situated in a convenient location. Very close to the Orchard road and easily accessible to public transport etc., yet it is situated in a quiet street next to Mt. Elizabeth Hospital which is very good. The hotel is accessible via Scotts road which is also a major road in the Central Region. Some of the hotel staff members, the house keeping people, doormen, and restaurant staff were very friendly and helpful. However, the reception area and hotel front officers were not very friendly, and not very keen on helping as well. Relatively to many hotels in the area, the rooms in the hotel are larger and more spacious. Buffet breakfast was not very big, but had

title: Unhappy experience
desc: Overall the room looks disgusting because some of wall paper peeling off, bathtub grouts got black marks and found a Band-Aid on the floor. We checked out in early morning and found the front desk didn‚Äôt wear mask, even the guests were in the lobby.

title: York Hotel
desc: Good Location. Few minutes walk from the Orchard road shopping malls. The rooms are quite basic and needs an overall upgradation in terms of flooring, washroom, beds, amenities etc. The restaurant area should have proper air vents as the food smell disturbs the people going to their rooms

title: Overall good experience
desc: The room was nice. We stayed in the cabana. The bed was comfortable. We had a good sleep. Breakfast buffet was decent. The staff were professionals and courteous. They also have a ramp and lift so a plus for having strollers and wheelchair. Overall good and relaxing. Location wise also walking distance from paragon mall.

title: Great Hotel in good location
desc: Great hotel with helpful and attentive staff. This hotel is situated a short walk from Orchard Avenue but is quiet and peaceful compared to the rest of Singapore. Rooms are very spacious and although the hotel is a little dated compared to some, the ambience and spacious surrounds are a great trade off. Approx 12 mins walk to Orchard MRT. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Home far away from home
desc: York Hotel always in our first pick for hotel whenever we go to Singapore. This hotel is like our home far away from home. The staff is so friendly and the service is always ecxellent. Keep up the good work guys.

title: Great Value and central location.
desc: Well serviced hotel, great amenities and superb location. Great value. Swimming pool, private and superb local food daily. Service is very good with motivated , responsive and experienced staff. Easy taxi or road or MRT transport access.

title: Unhappy
desc: A little disappointing! Arrived at the hotel directly from Changi Airport after flying for 12+ hours to be told that checkin was not available until 15.00hrs! We struggled with fatigue until 13.30hrs where we complained as other guests were being checked in!!! We were then given a room. The room itself was nice and roomy and well kitted out. Breakfast was fine and staff friendly. However, the hotel advertise a bar and refreshment services when using the pool. This is not the case and there is no hotel bar and no where to get refreshments in the hotel. If we ever return to Singapore we will not be using the York Hotel.

title: highly recommended
desc: it would be nice if you add jacuzzi pool.. i also love the gym and the pool. i havent tried the restaurant, maybe next visit. we also checked in during F1 season and the hotel did great in accomodating the guests even it was fully occupied

title: My girlfriend and I had great time staying at the York. Excellent location and a clean, quite room.
desc: We will gladly choose to there again. We had booked the room with breakfast included and I must say that some days the breakfast wasn't to our likeness, but I guess they have to cater for a lot of different nationalities and tastes. Overall we had a great couple of weeks.

title: York Hotel stay
desc: The staff are wonderful; they are friendly and courteous through my stay. I was there for Medical appointment however, I was amazed that the hotel is within walking distance to Orchard Road, walking distance to the shop, restaurants and some banks.

title: MGD review
desc: Overall, I am satisfied with my stay at York Hotel. I was quickly accommodated and our room is thoroughly cleaned everyday. I just noticed that the flush in the CR is sometimes weak and it is hard to adjust the water temperature at the shower.

title: Poor Service and tired
desc: Stayed for the F1 weekend and found the staff unwelcoming and that we were an inconvenience. This was not a single area, it was across the hotel. Breakfast was not co-ordinated and people were allowed to sit eat breakfast and then asked for a credit card, if their board did not include breakfast. Board basis needs to be checked before people are seated, we were bed and breakfast but this was observed several times. The room was clean and furnished to a good standard but tired. The location is good for Orchard Road, about a 10 minute walk to the MRT.

title: York Hotel's review
desc: In my review, the service was good, and the location of the hotel is near Orchard rd. but for the cleanliness, I think not good. but, I will recommend this hotel. because the price is good, and the WIFI connection I think its very good.

title: Conducive environment for event
desc: I was at this hotel for a conference on mediation organized by the International Institute of Mediation. The conference room at the second floor was spacious and conducive. Sound system was perfectly audible with little disruption from the other hotel guests waiting at the lobby. Food was sumptuous with local delights. The staff were courteous and friendly. Location of hotel is very central right in the middle of Orchard Road. During the break, I was able to go to the OCBC bank at Wisma Atria to deposit my cheques. Love this place!

title: Im like a frequent customer for this hotel lol
desc: I'd say it was a nice, enjoyable and comfortable stay! :D Its also my frequent choice to stay whenever I visit Singapore for leisure! A highly recommended hotel in my opinion!‚ù§ Hope to stay in this hotel again!

title: Nice accommodation in Singapore
desc: York Hotel is convenient for transportation (bus & MRT station) near Orchard Rd & Newton Station and also calm place to accommodate & safe for family trip even walking back to hotel around mid-night..

title: Staycation
desc: Staycation with friends. It's great as the location is convenient. There's plenty of food choices for delivery. The only thing is we could not connect our chromecast to the tv. The tv channels are not very interesting thus if you intend to Netflix, bring a laptop along.

title: i don't understand about this box.
desc: i don't understand to fill this box also. If you can please give me an example. All in all, we've stayed in YORK Hotel since 2006 and we still satisfy the the location, the service anyway. However, we had encountered the difficulty on booking directly on line at the point of payment by Visa Card then the hotel did not give back confirmation on time that made us wondering and prompting to make another booking to ensure the stay regardless the double deposit or payment. Thank you!

title: excellent location
desc: the location is good, behind far east plaza which is near MRT underpass and bus stop, so you can reach the hotel by bus or MRT. many variety of food choice around the hotel also, lucky plaza is good choice if you are looking for indonesian food, there is a food opera also in ion mall. if you do the medical check in ME its the excellent choice to stay here.

title: Vg
desc: Location is excellent, very near (walking distance) to shopping center and all necessities; clinic, hospitals, wellness shops, restaurants, church etc. Room is very spacious. Excelllent breakfast buffet, international cuisine.

title: York Hotel - reasonable stay but require improvement
desc: Good hotel but to increase the front office crew to 3 instead of just 1 or 2 (expect to wait a couple of minutes because it could go to 0 crew). There is construction going on at present, do expect noise during office hours. Good location, price and concierge services.

title: A old hotel with good location
desc: The hotel has a good location. It is located in residential area and is close to downtown through its two doors at different direction. Its room is relatively big and it is quite during night Ôºàthere is an ongoing construction project nearby so there may have some noise during the day). It wifi is also good and stable. However, it is a old hotel and no surprise. Moreover, the service I experienced is just ok.

title: Excellent choice for stay in Singapore near Orchard Road
desc: We booked 5 rooms. Hotel is in a very good location walking distance to Orchard Road, but located in a quiet neighborhood. Buffet breakfast is good.Premier room is big. Deluxe room is not crampy. We had a delightful stay.

title: Decent hotel
desc: Spent 4 nights there, check in was very swift, cleanliness good, staff very friendly and helpful. Price for a family room was reasonable I think. The room was very big. The main plus point is it's location. Not very far from Orchard road. Some 5/10 mins walk. The breakfast was OK nothing extravagant. Decent hotel where staff tries their best to please you.

title: Quite good condition except bathroom
desc: Bathroom is serious due to bad smell and mold. but I was satisfied in location, room condition and kind staffs. If Bathroom is imporved, I absoultely recommend York Hotel to others. Especially, this hotel is very proper for a family of 4 people.

title: Good accomodation
desc: strategic location because near orchard road and mount elizabeth hospital large room clean room clean bathroom comfortable and hommy atmosphere good staf and very helpful good internet connection ( wifi room )

title: Prompt and exceptional Service
desc: I and my family were so happy to stay during CNY period in the hotel because we were treated kindly and exceptionally even though we had some issues related to booking through Adoda. Ms Narsa and Mr. Adi handled the issues in a very professional way which satisfied my family. Thank you.

title: A skip and hop and voila, shopping paradise!
desc: Convenient location - everything is within walking distance. Staff is friendly and helpful. Well appointed despite its age. However closer attention can be paid to the bathroom cleanliness to improve comfort level.

title: Nice Room, but breakfast and room service need improvement
desc: Breakfast not suitable for non-Chinese. Room Service very bad attitude and service standard extremely bad. Otherwise front desk and White Rose Cafe staff are very helpful and professional. Quite Location for get away.

title: Good stay in room
desc: the price is good for the room. however some food was missing late time breakfast buffet and some hair in bathroom ,it is not clean well. hopely add trainining machine and internet cable for connectionto PC more faster.

title: Comfortable Stay
desc: We are a family of 5 and was able to stay in their Quadruple Room (1 King and 2 Single beds). The room was super spacious and the beds were very comfortable. We didn't stay in the room much except to sleep at night, but the housekeeping staff kept it clean and refilled our water all the time (even though we requested for more). The room is a bit on the "old" side, but it's still relatively clean. I'm not sure if the price is competitive or we just came on a peak season, but that's the only reason why I didn't rate this a 5-star. The location is not bad too, walking distance to Orchard Road. The nearest mall would be Paragon, then Lucky Plaza... Lots of places to eat there inside. Overall, I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Singapore.

title: Stay with Family
desc: Very good and near orchard, it was nice to stay with family. If there is big room for 6 people or smaller it will be better. also the pricing will be better if could be lower. the stay is very nice. thanks.

title: Good hotel
desc: York Hotel is located just a few meters behind Lucky Plaza and Paragon Orchard Road. The lobby was spacious and very cool. Checking in and checking out was fast. Considering that what I paid for included buffet breakfast, my stay at York Hotel was worth it!

title: Great
desc: I was so relaxed. Bathroom, restroom, location and your attitude is so good. I thought that the quality of the amenities should have been a little higher. I think that this trip was very fulfilling thanks to your hotel.

title: Good Location and Friendly Staff, But Room and Bathroom Had Problems
desc: Our biggest grief with the hotel was the room condition and bathroom. There was mold near the air conditioning and the room smelled a bit mildewy. The shower/tub combo was very difficult to get into because the tub walls were high and the handle near the shower was not properly anchored. While the location of the hotel is pretty good and the staff were friendly, we would not stay here again.

title: triple room, but not 3 single bed....
desc: we booked triple room, but when we arrived at the room. There were just 2 sing bed, so we asked for the another bed. and they gave us the small 'extra' bed. when we booked the room, there was the explanation of triple room. "Triple room is the room with '1 double bed + 1 single bed' or '3 single bed'."But there were no '1 double bed + 1 single bed' or '3 single bed', only 2 single bed with 1 extra bed which was asked by 'us'.

title: We would stay here again
desc: Great location, walking distance to Orchard Rd. The rooms were clean and very big, we had 3 adults sharing the room. The shower over the bath is a little small but not a deal breaker. The room was cleaned everyday and early too, a few times while we were at breakfast. We also got 2 large bottles of water every day. Staff were friendly. The breakfast buffet had a lot of options for everyone and reasonably priced for a hotel breakfast. We used room service once but for pool side service which wasn't bad. We couldn't order alcohol though. Overall, we would stay here again if we are back in Singapore.

title: Great option in Singapore
desc: Excellent location, accomodation and service with affordable fares. Staff members highly attentive and helpful. Breakfast quite varied and pleasant. Spacious, comfortable and extremely clean room. I highly recommend!

title: stay in york hotel
desc: been staying in York hotel several time , not the best experience but yeah no major problem , just the hotel is little run down , sound proof was not as good and the corridor carpet smell sticky .but yeah , because of the location , we still choose to stay there . but recent trip was really unpleasant as we found a strange and scary statue under the tv cabinet that dont belongs to us . tried calling for help but receptionist is not attentive enough . was told only one 1 staff on duty in housekeeping which is not acceptable and ridiculous . and i was told i cant change room as there are no more room left . so i went down to front desk , luckily the front desk was kind enough to change room for me .

title: A convenience hotel with good price.
desc: York is a convenience hotel with good price locates near to Orchard road and some medical centre. It is our fave stay in Spore for leisure and medical trip. Recommended for individual, family and business trip.

title: Great stay with Family of 5
desc: We had a great time and the hotel was excellent. My wife read several reviews that mentioned concerns about cleanliness so we were nervous arriving, but it was immaculate and continued to be for our 12 night stay. The only thing I would say that wasn‚Äôt positive was that the restaurant at lobby level is not good value for money. For our family we spent $100+ On breakfast and it was lacking in quality and options for a buffet. I would not recommend. Other than that, I would highly recommend the hotel, just eat elsewhere.

title: Good food and great hospitality!
desc: The yearly event for the Penang Hawker food fair definitely worth to dine out! Is value for money as well with the good choice variety! Char Kuey Teow always the best to try out! The Mee Chang Kueh always never let us disappointed and always keep it at the standard. Prawn Mee also delicious as well. Thanks the chef for the delicious food, also great hospitality service from Marc Kee.

title: Value for money
desc: Strategic location & big rooms. Value for money. Guest Officers can do better to improve service as they are not attentive to customers' needs. Bathroom amenities such as bath gel & shampoo leave a lot to be desired as the quality is average.

title: Great
desc: Everything was good. Except thr carpet was a bit sticky. Great location (5minutes walking distance to paragon) Swimming pool isnt crowded. Good to chill. Services are great. Every staffs are friendly.

title: Good hotel to stay
desc: If you are going to use the room for sleeping and shower only, it will meet your need. It does have good breakfast food, with varieties of food; international and local. Guest service is great. Hotel crews are friendly.

title: Thanks York Hotel
desc: we stayed at their family room and it was indeed spacious as well as clean. Bathroom did not disappoint us too. the location is just right and really value for money. the staff was also friendly and courteous... well done York Hotel !

title: Comfortable stsy
desc: We had a wonderful stay at York hotel. The room was spacious and very clean. Enjoyed the time in the pool. The front office staff were very welcoming and gave us alot of tips on travel and places to eat. It‚Äôs such a convenient location. Just 10 mins walk to orchard road.

title: Great family stay
desc: Spacious room, with a working desk and a couch, cozy beds & pillows. A 5-minute walk to Orchard, nearby hospital. Over-all, York Hotel has a great, superb servicel Except for our 1st night when d housekeeping lady who slammed the door behind her after she brought the toiletries requested. I think she was the same lady who just opened our door as we prepared to check-out that moment without even knocking or ringing a bell. Please have the courtesy to knock first so that you wouldn't shock your guests.

title: Hotel with good location & value for money
desc: stayed for 2 nights from 23rd April till 25th April 25 . upgraded to a Delux room with 2 queen beds without charge. stay was pleasant and comfortable. Breakfast promo was going on so got a very good rate for the same .

title: Not meet my expectation as 4 star hotel.
desc: 1. Dust in my room. Already complain, but no change. I'm dust allergic. 2. Bathub sink is not working well. Need to push many times to make it works. 3. AC is leaking. 4. Hotel location is good. Near orchard road and far east plaza.

title: Eid Holiday Two Families with Kids
desc: First time stayed at this Hotel from many times trip to Singapore. Great location, walking distance only to the famous Orchard road. Hotel considered Old, however facilities such as bath tub & pool, enough to satisfy all the kids. Memorable experience, since first time join holiday with family from Medan too. Hope can get promotional stay thru email registered during check in.. =D

title: We'll definitely be back again soon.
desc: Thank you for a wonderful stay. My wife and I, along with my in-laws, loved our stay. Plus, the overall service and general cleanliness of the hotel makes the price all worth it. Special shoutout to Thiban as well for the free room upgrade.

title: Room full of Dust
desc: very Dusty room with molded accessories ( June 2023 ). A hotel with long history and quite a number of long service staffs, it will a pity if they do not work hard to keep up with Singapore's changing status.

title: Interesting stay
desc: A more affordable alternative to other hotels around Orchard. It is a bit of a walk to the MRT so we ended up paying for cab fare. Our floor was being renovated so it's a bit of an eyesore, but not an inconvenience since we're out most of the day.

title: Singapore tour 2023
desc: The service from the time we arrived until we left was superb. The lady who cleaned our room was very attentive and so courteous.Buffet breakfast was very good. We will definitely get this hotel ifwe go back to Singapore. Plus it is so near Paragon, Lucky Plaza and Far East Plaza.üôÇ

title: York Hotel Review
desc: The York Hotel is good value for money and is close to Orchard Road and Newton Food Centre. Service is friendly and excellent and the rooms are clean and spacious and the free welcome drink was a welcome surprise - but the WIFI connection is poor.

title: Good food!
desc: Breakfast buffet at its best. The variety of food choices is excellent. I enjoyed pink salmon the best. Har kaw and other dumplings are also good treats in the morning food treat. Soya milk is overflowing and I really liked it.

title: Spacious room and comfortable bed
desc: York hotel provides the spacious room with the reasonable price which is pretty hard to find in Singapore. There are various options for breakfast for you to choose and the staff are nice and friendly too.

title: An hotel now in dire need of modernization and refurbishment
desc: An hotel that I remember from my Singapore trips back in the 1980's. Now, in dire need of renovation. One only has to look up at the York hotel from its outside swimming pool to see the state of the paintwork of the main building. The staff do their best and are attentive and friendly. The White Rose Cafe restaurant serves authentic Asian cuisine, but during our week at the hotel, hardly any guests were having dinner there. We ate at the White Rose one evening and were the only guests dining (we could have a long chat with the restaurant staff). It has very little ambiance apart from the view of the chef preparing your meal. The barren tables really could use a tablecloth to brighten them up. Unfortunately, the major problem for us were the other guests. The hotel seems to be

title: poor
desc: Not very flexible approach to paying for your stay in other currencies. Recommending an exchange machine with an exchange rate at the level of robbery is embarrassing to say the least. The cuisine is not very diverse, focused only on Chinese guests. Visitors from other countries are treated as intruders, although they also bring income to the hotel. I will definitely not recommend your hotel.

title: Neat and Clean
desc: Customer service are good and rooms are clean and good. location is good for shopping and to try different foot types two to thee shopping malls are near by for shopping. During night place is quite and calm to sleep

title: Good Location
desc: York Holte is located near the center of shopping area and hub station. And Lucky Plaza is near this hotel. So you could get the small things you need for everyday life at a reasonable price. So if you are looking for hub of your city activity, sight seeing, I think that York Hotel. is good choice.

title: Setting a new standard of excellence on our hearts
desc: York Hotel has been our favorite place to stay in Singapore. Not only the location is great, but the staff are so helpful and kind. Especially there is a special lady, Miss Faizah, from the Sales Department. She has been so so so kind and thoughtful in accommodating us and our needs. Her exemplary hospitality and helpfulness is what sets the standard of excellent ourstanding service and made York Hotel so personal and a home to us. Thank you for being there in our worst and best time. Thanks for having our back . May God bless you especially Ms Faizah ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Stay at York Hotel Singapore
desc: Great hotel, very well located (very close to the city's shopping district, yet in a calm side street) and with great customer service and facilities! The room where I stayed was wide and clean, with all the necessary equipment and accessories. The shower provided a great and relaxing water pressure. One thing to improve is that the bath box allowed too much water to spill out, wetting the floor. Great overall experience, providing value for money! Thank you!

title: Great location with very comfortable beds.
desc: Staff were very friendly. Beds were very comfortable and breakfast buffet had a great variety. The location was very close to Orchard Road and the pool was a lovely temperature and very clean. Will definitely stay here again.

title: Bugs in a room
desc: Need to update the room. The rooms had bugs and the lights flicked on and off. The bug experience would be something expected in a third world country, not in Singapore. The room size was very good and accommodated the family, but the room and external areas need to be updated to a more modern experience..

title: staff ar every great!
desc: i would like to commend your staff whom i forgot her name. she was a female Filipina and she's on duty last september 16, 2023 and she went out at 4:30 pm. i was in a bit of a pickle because i had something to be delivered to me and i have no cash and she with whole heartedly lended me the 6 dollars i asked to borrow. Also before me, she was assisting somebody who is an a situation also who needed her help, she is also an foreigner who lost her wallet going to sgd and has no card or anything if i get my recall right, she needs to call international and she has to put coins to be able to, since she had nothing, she delightedly did it for the guest and helped her. she is from valenzuela here in the Philippines if im not mistaken. her dedication to serve us guest is beyond, you

title: Room not cool enough
desc: Our room was clean and the hotel staff was pleasant and kind. But Singapore is hot and our room never got cool enough for us. We had people out to check the Air Conditioning 3 times. We could not get the temperature below 24C which just was not cool enough with the humidity. They did bring us a standing fan which helped a lot. Shower: We had to leap over a 2.5 foot ledge to get into the shower/bath combo. We are not young so every shower (and we took many) felt like we were risking our lives, j/k. My husband did slip once but he caught himself. Room service was fast, good and cheap. Nice feature when you are jet lagged. Good location. Our room was right by the pool which is why we did not insist on changing rooms, nor was another room offered. We were told in no uncertain

title: Location Location
desc: Fantastic location, so close to Orchard Road and shopping. Lovely size room and great facilities. Staff lovely and attentive. Good variety buffet breakfast. Ours was a short stay but it made a lasting impression and we will be back.

title: Good Quality Penang Hawker Fare
desc: We recently dined at White Rose Cafe and enjoyed the large spread of Penang food which was of good quality. Reasonable buffet pricing. The reservation system was seamless and we were ushered to our table immediately upon arrival.

title: Excellent value great service
desc: This hotel is conveniently located near Paragon shopping centre. It is a short walk to Orchard Rd where this a variety of shopping choices. The staff were extremely helpful when my phone malfunctioned and I was without communication with home. The locals frequent the restaurant for functions which is a good sign. Breakfast was plentiful and catered for all tastes.

title: Terrible H√¥tel
desc: Terrible H√¥tel. I did not dare sit anywhere except the bed. All seemed dirty and was smelly. Not clean. There are 2 towers, either I got the worst one or I don‚Äôt understand the other feedbacks. On 12th floor a couple of rooms with door damaged. Smelling food everywhere anytime of the day.

title: A good place to stay
desc: I stayed at york hotel orchard for joining the Token2049 event the location near the event place and close to mrt by walking 5 minutes you can dine in hotel or nearby Tang plaza overall the staff provided an exceptional service. So good to stay here during visit Singapore

title: Dated and not clean
desc: Very questionable hygiene standard. Stains are everywhere in the hotel room: on towels, toilet, wall, bedsheet. There‚Äôs juice stain on the closet door, they‚Äôre just not cleaning this place properly. It‚Äôs ok for a hotel to be dated, but this one is dated and dirty. And there are ants in the room, I‚Äôve found them on the table, in the bathroom and on the bed!! I can‚Äôt be bothered to take photos of every problem, but here are a few. I can‚Äôt wait to leave this hotel.

title: Penang Hawkers‚Äô Fare Always Good
desc: The Penang Hawkers‚Äô Fare is a quarterly event for about 2 weeks each time. Available for lunch and dinner. If you make a reservation, you will have to pay at the time of making the reservation. You can also just walk in and join the queue. It was very busy on a Sunday night. The spread includes Penang Laksa, Char Kway Teow, Oyster Omelette, Roti Canai/Prata, Rojak (fruits & vegetables), Penang Prawn Mee Soup, Jiu Hu Eng Chai (cuttlefish with kangkong), Kway Teow Tng (Flat rice noodle soup) plus new dishes: Pasembur, Jiu Hu Char, and See Guo Tng (not good), Chendol (good taste but green stuff too stiff) , very good and crispy Ban Chang Kueh now has an additional two fillings (cream corn and black sugar) besides the usual peanuts. I love most dishes. Been enjoying these

title: sad stay after pandemic
desc: the check counter are not that courteous compared to before and surprise to know that bedsheets and pillow cases are changed only after 3 days when room stay paid in full for each day. If not for the price difference we should prefer to stay in other hotels

title: Everything good
desc: Very recommended to stay staff very friendly, room very clean and calm, car park clean and near the lobby. I will come again next time and also will recommend to my others family friends to stay in this hotel and get the best service

title: Not bad, a bit tired and cost to high
desc: PRO'S: 1. Superb professional service and support provided by Faizah Mustapah and the team 2. Breakfast 3. Location 4. Warm welcome and smiles upon check-in CON'S: 1. Expensive 2. Tired look and feel to the hotel 3. Some mould around the bath/shower sealant areas 4. Couldn't find BBC News or some other global TV networks that are usually associated to expensive hotels

title: Loved it!
desc: My husband, two children and I stayed at the York Hotel in March 2016 and had a wonderful time. We had flown in from a week in Thailand and I have to admit was worried about the prospect of staying in a fifteenth floor, vacuum sealed room. We were so pleasantly surprised when escorted to a beautiful pool side room with small porch and two large beds. The kids thought they were in heaven and spent every waking hour in the pool which I have to say was really nice. I had no problem with breakfast - very nice - and the check out and check in service was excellent. At one stage I approached the reception desk, as my small son was not well, to request if there was a doctor nearby they could recommend. They directed me to the Mount Elizabeth hospital which was just around the

title: Must have extra energy to walk to this hotel
desc: We can reach this hotel by walking from Orchard MRT and walk across the underground tunnel to opposite of the station. But one should have extra energy to reach this hotel as the road to the hotel is rather uphill, so it is not recommended for elderly. Their room is big enough not like any new hotel nowadays which seems so small, but their lowest category which is superior room only have queen bed and twin bed. They don't have king bed size on superior room. The breakfast have a lot of options but the taste is not too great in my opinion, they even serves spaghetti that morning, which i don't think is suitable for breakfast. Next to the hotel is Mount Elizabeth hospital, so probably the majority of guests staying here is a patient or family of the patient.

title: not good
desc: Very old hotel. Rooms with old dirty carpet. An old-fashioned shower The smell of cigarette smoke in the room was stifling. The receptionist gave me a fan for the smell. A hotel priced at $ 133 is both expensive and stinking I would not recommend you staying at this hotel. If you smoke and love cigarettes then this is a good place for you.

title: Good location but accommodations need renovation
desc: Hotel set in nice location. Lobby and restaurant looks good but Sleeping rooms need renovation. Also booked Deluxe room but was checked in as superior. When asked at the counter , they said mistake and had to move room. Re pack again not convenient. Check in staff not accommodating.

title: Ugly old hotel
desc: I can't point any good thing about this hotel, start from snob ladies at receptionist to the ugly old small room. Snob ladies at the front desk don't even look at my face when we are check in, asking something or check out. Room was so old and small, bed was so ugly uncomfortable, bathroom so ugly. Everything was UGLY !

title: Great location close to Orchard Road. Safe and convenient.
desc: Lovely hotel. Walked to Orchard Rd within 5 minutes. Great spacious room with all amenities. Friendly staff. The pool is a little small for the size of the hotel. Maybe this is usual for Singapore. I would return to this hotel again.

title: Clean and Ok Stay - Good Choice if you are Travelling to Shop
desc: Stayed at York Hotel when I was in Singapore on a business trip. The room was clean and tidy enough. The hotel's location is the best thing working for them, as it is a quick 5 minutes walk away from Orchard - which is the shopping district in Singapore, with big brand names lining up the street - and it is also a 10 minutes walk from 2 train stations Somerset and Orchard. So, its a good choice if you are travelling to shop. Our flight arrived early in the morning, so we had to wait till the room was ready, but the hotel does have luggage storage services till that is arranged, so you just have to speak to the concierge to hold your luggage instead of lugging them around with you. A critical thing to point out was the wifi connection in the room. As I was travelling on work,

title: Comfortable & hospitable
desc: Nice property located in Orchard - the major shopping area of Singapore. As its in a back lane there is not much traffic & hubbub yet one is at a 5 minute walking distance from the main shopping area. The hotel staff is quite cordial & helpful. The rooms are well appointed and of fairly good size, with a wardrobe, a drawer shelf, dressing /writing table & coffee table. I was in a triple occupancy room with three beds and still there was enough room for free movement. Washroom too was clean & of good size with a bathtub & all, with all the necessary toiletries. Housekeeping quite active & prompt to respond. Buffet breakfast had quite an elaborate menu with various veg/non-veg options. However for pure vegetarians, that we are, the choice was not that great. We were there for 7

title: Great hotel for family stay
desc: The hotel has family rooms that can accommodate family with children with two double beds. It is close to the great shopping Orchard road and Mt. Elizabeth Hospital. The food was lovely and the staff was helpful. We had a lovely relaxed and enjoyable holiday.

title: CENTRALLY LOCATED
desc: Neat, clean and centrally located Hotel, within walking distance to Orchard Road, the shopping Mecha of Singapore. Taxis frequent the Hotel often, so there is no shortage of Transport.They accommodate late checkouts, or luggage storage for free the whole day, in case of late flights, they also have shower facitilites with towels at the pool to have a refreshing shower before heading off to the airport. Room service is quick and efficient. There is a tour operator on site to assist with tours withing the city and surrounds. The swimming pool is huge with a Jacuzzi alongside. There are smoking rooms at the hotel, only downfall is that the windows don‚Äôt open, but this is the norm it seems with overseas hotels, so if you are a smoker, rather book a non smoking room. But very

title: Standards have slipped
desc: This was our second stay at the York Hotel in Singapore. We wouldn't not stay here again. There was an absolutely hideous stench in the corridor of our room. I complained and something was done to neutralise the smell for the night. The smell returned the next day and continued for our stay. Would hate to know what it was causing it. The room was a great size, but small food stains on carpet. The rooms need to be updated. The service at the hotel was friendly enough at the counter. The buffet breakfast was extremely disappointing a big drop in standard from our last visit 3 years ago. Extremely noisy guests surrounding us. You could hear straight through the walls. We will stay somewhere else next time.

title: Okay but could be improved
desc: My partner and I stayed here for 5 nights. He was on a business trip for the first two days and we extended his trip so we could have a small break afterwards. The room was large and relatively clean, however if you were expecting your room to match the high standards of decor of the lobby and ground floor you'll be disappointed as the room is dated and in need of some updates and TLC e.g. Peeling paint in bathroom. Our stay was satisfactory however my main gripe was the amount of thick, long black hairs I found constantly in the room, on the beds etc. I have long fine, blonde hair so they definitely weren't mine and the black ones were everywhere. You couldn't sit on a surface without one sticking to your clothes. I'm just glad they weren't short black ones! :/ I also agree

title: Very good, clean, spacious accommodation
desc: We stayed in a family room with a king bed and two singles and the room was perfect. Elegant, very clean and spacious. It was just right for a family with two teenagers. The location was good too. We walked to dinner each night and the attractions we visited weren't too far away in a cab. The only issue we had was on check in the staff member said there was a special on the buffet breakfast which we agreed to but changed our mind after the first one as it wasn't that good and we would rather go out to lunch anyway. title: Family stay cation
desc: Booked a Family Room for birthday celebration, the room for the price i paid is worth every penny. Room was very spacious and clean and great location, 5 to 10 mins walk to orchard road. Breakfast wise require room for improvement. Overall for the price, location and the room size, its a good deal.

title: Not recommended hotel for biz trip
desc: Stayed two nights, about 5-10mins walking distance to Orchard rd. Old room and some smell and some staff are far from kind. will definetely not going back. But if you need to stay in city and your budget is limited, this hotel can be a solution

title: Highly recommended
desc: We stayed here for 10 nights, with our two children (age 8 and 6) Great base for exploring Singapore! It's a short-ish walk to Orchard rd, and MRT stations, but it's location on 'Mt Victoria', (really just a small hill) should give you a clue that it's up-hill to the York hotel from Orchard rd. No big deal, just wear comfortable shoes! It's a safe place to walk, even at night. The room was spacious, clean and comfortable. We all loved the pool - great way to start and finish our days. We didn't eat in the restaurant as we were spoiled for choice everywhere we went! The staff were friendly and super-helpful, they booked a couple of tours for us, which was a hassle-free experience. We'd happily stay here again.

title: York
desc: Stayed here as a stop over room we had was spacious and we had breakfast included everything that you wanted to eat. Very close to walk to the main shopping hub. Late checkout was provided at no extra cost. Would stay here again.

title: York
desc: Stayed here as a stop over room we had was spacious and we had breakfast included everything that you wanted to eat. Very close to walk to the main shopping hub. Late checkout was provided at no extra cost. Would stay here again.

title: Excellent if traveling on business
desc: Centrally located on Mount Elizabeth. Reception already makes you aware that this hotel is managed by Goodwood. Friendly and professional. Room was comfortable and clean. Rates are economic. Breakfast menu is good standard. The right choice, if you need to stay close to Orchard road and not spend a fortune.

title: Excellent if traveling on business
desc: Centrally located on Mount Elizabeth. Reception already makes you aware that this hotel is managed by Goodwood. Friendly and professional. Room was comfortable and clean. Rates are economic. Breakfast menu is good standard. The right choice, if you need to stay close to Orchard road and not spend a fortune.

title: Excellent service with great staff
desc: Room was spacious with comfortable bed (value for money). Front Desk staff are so helpful and friendly. Just minutes walking distance to Orchard Road. The oven pork chop was very good. York Hotel is highly recommended for staycation to all my family and friends. Well done!

title: The York Hotel
desc: In October 2016, we spent 4 nights at The York Hotel, it was a very enjoyable visit, and renewed our faith in the Singaporean hospitality industry. We found The York to be a very well run hotel, the rooms were clean, breakfast was generous, with a very varied menu. The staff were helpful and kind. It is situated close (walking distance) to the heart of Orchard Rd. This is a good honest professionally run hotel, it is unpretentious and good value.

title: Fair
desc: Not my current visit but mostly few times i enjoy stay at york. Staff are okay. Average atmosphere in york. Will visit soon on 2018. Location is okay near mount elizabeth, easy for me as a check up patient there. Exhausting road by walk because just like a hill

title: Convenient location
desc: The location of the hotel was good, but the room size was very small especially when they put in an extra bed. After a flight and taxi ride,the check-in process was slow and heard other guests complained about various issues while they were checking out.

title: Very Comfortable and Friendly Hotel
desc: We had a great stay at the York Hotel, Singapore late December, 2016. The rooms have everything you need, are quite spacious and the staff are very friendly and helpful. The hotel is also well situated with easy access by foot or train to all the major sites in Singapore. We would definitely use the York Hotel again if we return to Singapore.

title: The affordable Hotel in Orchard Area
desc: I've been staying in this hotel several times. Their family room is so big. Friendly staff and service. Very close to the Mount Elizabet Hospital and Paragon Medical Center, so I cab make a quick move when I have to see the doctor.

title: Comfy yet good price
desc: Stayed here for 3 nights, it was a great location (not too far from Orchard Rd), the room are fresh, linen are clean. Maybe need to upgrade the bathroom (Nowadays people prefer a standing shower compare to bathtub with a shower curtain). This hotel serve a very good fried kwetiau, laksa noodle, and fish-head curry.

title: Mixed package
desc: Let me start with the pros: Excellent location and I can't stress this enough. Right next to Orchard Road, right behind the Paragon Mall and next door to Mt. Elizabeth Hospital. Huge spread at breakfast. Helpful staff Cons: Horrible wifi. Average overpriced food at restaurant. Slightly overpriced.

title: Very Good Service
desc: We were allowed to an early check in since there was an available family room, thanks to Ms. Rosemary Chan for the nice and fast check in. The room was huge and clean. Buffet breakfast was good. A few minutes walk to Orchard MRT station. Will definitely come back.

title: Spacious Room
desc: Stayed here for one night with my husband and two kids aged 13 and 11. The room was very spacious, had king bed and two singles, I did alot of research to find a room that catered for all of us and there wasnt too many (room 803). A little dated maybe, but still a nice room. The hotel has an outside pool and a separate spa. I did see a gym but cant comment as didnt use this facility. The room included breakfast which had lots of variety. The hotel is a good 5 minute walk from Orchard Road itself and another 5 mintues to the MRT. Its worth noting that the hotel is up a slight hill, which for some might be a problem in the heat. It was a nice hotel for first time but I think I would try somewhere different next time. We paid $440 nzd.

title: Enjoyable stay, as usual
desc: I have visited here many times, which testifies to how much I enjoy my stay here. I have always had good rooms, with everything is clean and working the way I like it. This time, we stayed in a bigger room and suite for my sister's family. We both enjoyed the big space. The big swimming pool is a plus point for us since we brought small children during this travel. It is not too far from all the Orchard Road experience so it is easy to get food anywhere. Overall good stay, and I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again in my next visit.

title: big room...
desc: close to orchard road, check in very fast, but the room won't be ready before 1pm, the restaurant is very crowded during breakfast, the variety of choices is average, I am sure they can do better. Beware its an uphill walk from orchard road to hotel

title: Comfortable stay
desc: My stay in york hotel was amazing . The room was very big, clean and confy double bed . Very nice breakfast excellent service nice staff .Very recommended hotel for those would like to be close to the shopping malls .

title: Room very roomy
desc: The room was so roomy for the price. my kids very happy :) Wi fi signal excellent for uploading to my Dropbox. Just a few walk to Orchard road. I think its good to upgrade the bathroom, nowadays people prefer a standing shower for it more save space

title: ROOM SET UP TO IMPROVE
desc: I travel 2-3 times a year to Singapore and for last few years have been staying invariably in York and being a corporate client they upgrade my room!. Room allotted to me this time was really big size with 2 comfortable sofas in the middle of the room.However, the interior set up was strange. TV is fixed on the wall in the middle of the room and cannot rotate and one can view only from the sofa and not from bed and if one wants to read one has to be in the bed as there was no lighting around sofa!! When I complained on 3rd day I got a standing lamp but they did nothing to make TV rotate. I have been rating this hotel as v.good but December stay was really disappointing. They need to improve room set on priority.

title: Good Location, Comfortable Hotel.
desc: We recently spent 6 nights in a Premier Room at the York Hotel. The room was clean and spacious with a king size bed and two single beds. The bathroom was a good size and in the wardrobe, there was a dressing gown and slippers for each of us. Toiletries were replaced daily - shampoo, body wash, soap and a dental kit consisting of a toothbrush and small toothpaste. Two 1L bottles of complimentary water was also provided daily plus tea and coffee replenished. We used the free room wi-fi which was adequate for our needs. The buffet breakfast was included in our package and had a good selection of western and Asian foods. We had dinner at the White Rose Caf√© one night and the service was good and the food was lovely. The food was reasonably priced but the drinks and

title: Christmas Vacay 2016
desc: We stayed at York hotel during Christmas days! Nice service, attentive staff and the hotel is clean even though its a bit outdated. You must try their food its very good especially the Laksa. Walking distance to Orchard and very near the hospital. Its very hot during Christmas days there bring comfortable clothes and take note sometimes its raining hard in the afternoon. Try to schedule well your visits to others places like Marina, and Universal Studio. December 26 is holiday there and overcrowded at USS. Recommended Hotel

title: A Very Good Hotel
desc: Stayed here twice, two nights at the beginning of our holiday and another two nights at the end of our holiday. A quality hotel, large rooms comfortable beds and good in room facilities. Wifi was good throughout the hotel. We took the opportunity to use the outdoor pool which was excellent for swimming and sunbathing. Breakfasts were excellent with a choice of English, Continental and Asian. All the staff were very friendly and efficient. It's location was excellent close to Orchard Road (main shopping street in Singapore) A very pleasant stay we would unhesitatingly recommend this hotel!

title: Nice people and nice place
desc: So clean. Nice people. Nice food. So near with orchard road and many mall. The room more wide for more extra bed. This place good for family or couples. Very helpful price if we booked from internet. Overall very nice place

title: Decent Hotel
desc: Nice and cosy hotel. Abit old bit overall ok being in Orchard Rd. there is free wifi but slow on upper floors. Serves nice penang fare during December. Free onsite parking. 5 mins way to main Orcahrd Rd belt.

title: Pleasant trip
desc: The hotel is perfectly placed near to malls/markets/eateries/metro. Rooms are clean and well furnished. They are pleasantly spacious with nice view. The staff are very polite and friendly with prompt service. We enjoyed our stay and would certainly recommend if you want the best out of Singapore stay

title: Disappointing
desc: Poor customer service. Was rated a 4.5 star renovated hotelwhen we booked. Room was nice size, bed comfortable but the bathroom was old, vanity needed updating, mould on shower curtains, grouting. Breakfast was not really inviting. The person cooking eggs to order was grumpy and unwelcoming. The room was not vacuumed properly and daily we had to ring housekeeping for forgotten toiletries. The hotel was also too far from transport.

title: Perfect for families!!
desc: The York Hotel was one of the few hotels I could find in Singapore which could accommodate a family of 4 in one room. Singapore is not a cheap place to visit but the rates for this hotel were reasonable for good quality service and accommodation. Staff were always polite friendly and helpful. Our room was spacious, well equipped and modern. Wifi worked well. Breakfast buffet had excellent selections. The hotel is located in a quiet street just back from Orchard Road. Close to the MRT station and upmarket shopping centres. We all enjoyed the pool as it was much needed after a busy day of sightseeing in the Singapore heat! I would highly recommend this hotel for families looking for accommodation in Singapore.

title: Good hotel
desc: Rooms are clean. Breakfast is ok, Asian and western food. More asian options thou. Good location near Orchard road that has heaps of malls. It's walking distance to train station but as Singapore is very hot (and I had 2 kids), walking from train station to hotel was tiring sometimes.

title: Enjoy The Beating Heart of Singapore from the York!!
desc: What a great central location to set your base and explore everything Singapore has to offer! A nice clean hotel with quick easy access to: - Orchard Road's awesome shopping strip (6 min walk) - The Orchard MRT Train Station for rapid, easy transport all over the city (8 min walk) - Singapore Zoo ($20 Uber/27 mins) Nice rooms and a good size for families (2 adults, 2 kids). The pool was adequate for a quick dip to cool off and the breakfast buffet was nothing spectacular but gets your family fed and ready for a day out and about. You really couldn't ask for a better location to base yourself and get out to see the best Singapore has to offer!!

title: Spotless Like the City
desc: This hotel is very nice. It is clean and well organized. The restaurant area is large and well stocked. The rooms where quite large. The hotel is just a five minute walk from Orchard Rd. Great shopping in the area. Very convenient and accessible.

title: The quadruple room
desc: Very convenient location - 5 mins walk to Orchard road, and 2 mins walk to Mt. Elizabeth hospital - and still on a very quiet road itself. The rooms are bigger than what you generally get in Singapore. Stuff were great. We were a group of four and stayed in the quadruple room - which was huge. Highly recommended if you are big group.

title: Enormous room for a family of four
desc: Holidayed in Singapore city for a few days before going to Sentosa. The York Hotel is situated a five minute walk away from Orchard road and about 8-10 minutes away from the Orchard road underground railway station. But if you are happy to walk and/or use taxi's and Uber to get around the location is fine. Being close to Orchard road, shopping is within easy reach for the high end outlets if that is your thing. Check in took far too long as usual in Asian countries. There must be some strict processes they have to follow is the only way I can explain this. After long flights with kids all you want is to unpack, relax a bit and maybe take a shower. Having 30 minutes to check into your room just frustrates people. There seemed to be plenty of staff and no queue, just an overly

title: 2nd Home While in Town
desc: 7 times stayed here, York Hotel has become my second home while Im in town. Always feel satisfied with the hospitality, friendly and helpful staff, fast respond to all queries. Really feels like home. It should be rated more then excellent. Especially thanks to Mr. Chris Shaw (Assistant Sales Manager) who's really help and assist me for the reservation and queries before and during my stay. Definitely will always come back and stay at York Hotel.

title: Great location in Singapore
desc: Central location in the heart of Singapore. Poor breakfast and counter services, as well as a very poor room service response time. Very clean with a great range of services available. Great for the family

title: Exceeded expectations
desc: Pros: - Near Orchard MRT Station and bus stops - Accommodating and polite staff - Spacious room (not much design but ambiance is serene) - Clean bathroom - Room service food has pleasing taste and content - Comfortable beds - Wired internet is available - 2 Swimming pools (1 with toddler-friendly depth) - Bathroom in the pool area are clean and well-equipped Cons: - Cable channels have poor reception - Unreliable WiFi connection Visit Again? - Yes. Because of the staff, amenities and would like to try the pool-side rooms.

title: Perfect location for Orchard Road
desc: One night stopover from Hong Kong to Australia. Easy 5 min walk to Orchard Road for all the shopping attractions and associated MRT stations. About an hour's walk into the centre of the city (Marina Bay etc.) if you feel inclined. Very large room, a little tired but certainly comfortable (bathroom certainly in need of a bit of TLC). King sized bed with two large singles that had plenty of room for our teenagers. Breakfast was included in our package, very nice with plenty of choice in both continental and Full breakfast. Staff were excellent, yes check-in did take a fair while but everyone was greeted nicely throughout our short stay.

title: It was ok.
desc: The York Hotel is a good hotel if you want to be near Orchard Road and Scotts Road. It's a good walk to Orchard Road and to the any mall on it. The Hotel staff are not that friendly and very stiff but it's alright. The lobby looks nice and modern but the rooms look dated but clean. I was out all day with meetings and conferences didn't really stay in the room must just slept then out again the whole day for the next 3 days we where there. I am just happy it's clean and so is the bathroom.

title: Always feels like home
desc: The location of the hotel is quite convenient. There are two accesses; one from Far East Plaza and the other from Mount Elizabeth Hospital, although its an uphill walk. Foodcourts+supermarkets+malls and seven eleven are within walking distance. The hotel has a nice and cosy ambience. The staff here are very friendly and helpful. The rooms are quite spacious. Only drawback is the bathroom which had a bath tub with an attached shower head which may make it difficult for kids and elderly people. The breakfast is same almost everyday with minor changes but their waffles are amazing! Overall, location and room size are good with a warm staff that always have a smile on their face.

title: Affordable Hotel Around Orchard
desc: I have been staying at this place several times, and it never disappoint me. The room is quite spacious, the bed is comfortable, and most importantly is clean. The hotel location is very near to Mount Elizabeth Hospital and walking distance to Orchard road. The staffs were very friendly and helpful. But, the wifi in the hotel is not really good. Overall, very recommended hotel.

title: big room and comfortable
desc: the room quite big. Clean bathroom, comfy bed and very convenient location for stay with family, friend or for business. The building stand next to big hospital and walk distance to Orchard. Taxi drivers knows location of the hotel, so you don't have to explain the details to them.

title: Singapore is Beautiful!!
desc: We stopped in Singapore for 3 nights and stayed at the York Hotel from 2/18 - 2/21/17. The hotel is decent but could use some upgrades. It not having a lobby bar removes liveliness we saw at other hotels. The room was clean but needed some more art on the wall which would have made it seem less cold. The complimentary breakfast was excellent each morning. The staff was friendly & the location convenient to high end shopping and great dining. Singapore is a WONDERFUL city with fantastic architecture. We will definitely go back. However we will probably stay at another hotel.

title: Great stay
desc: I booked superior triple for me and my parents at York Hotel because it's near Mount Elizabeth Hospital. The staff upgraded our room to family room upon check in. It was really spacious. On the next day, I broke my shoes and asked the receptionist whether they have super glue. The staff told me that I could go back to my room while he is checking. Not long later, a maintenance staff come with a can of glue and some tools. Feels like going to a cobbler. Really grateful for the service. My dad commented the security guard in front of the lift could be more friendly though. On the other hotel my parents stayed previously, the staff helped to pressed the lift when he is near the lift and saw them walking towards there. But again, maybe he is just doing his job, trying to look

title: Holiday with kids
desc: I booked a quadruple room with breakfast.. Room was very large...one king bed and two singles...even had walk in wardrobe...very modern.. Decor..big tv...two chairs an table..dressing table with own chair as well. Buffett breakfast was very nice..good variety of good available . Local as well as international and continental cuisine Location was very good ...Orchard Rd a quick 5min walk away even with the humidity. Taxis always available outside.. Did not use mrt or public transport so cannot say how near mrt station.

title: Disappointed
desc: The room was the only good thing in this hotel it was large and spacious if a little worn The staff are some of the worst I have ever had to deal with (excluding Rosalind the assistant front desk manager) it would be a good idea to explain to the staff they work in a hospitality industry . The elderly lady supervisor should b retired off our found a job in the back of house.The wifi is atrocious and slow. Our agent booked a late check out and apparently they had no record of this I could go on .

title: Nothing special
desc: The York Hotel is pretty ordinary as hotels go in Singapore. The bed is comfortable but our bathroom was small and needing a renovation. The bath tub in particular is very cramped. It's a 3 star hotel in my view and slightly overpriced. (The breakfast was an outrageous $33 Singapore.) The only saving feature was the good size pool (good for laps) and the location (if you like Orchard Road shopping and eating). In my humble view there are much better options in the area. The Holiday Inn Express is alot better.

title: A bit disappointed
desc: York hotel is ok but not more than ok. The hotel is placed within walking distance to Orchard road and Newton Circus. The hotel is a bit run down. The rooms are simpel and comfortable. The water pressure was very low. The breakfast was fine but a bit tasteless, such as the watery omelettes, which were prepared some time before. The service level in the reception was also a bit lacking. They were smiling, but didn't really took it to that next levels. No service provided in the swimming pool area, but maybe is was due to off season.

title: Average
desc: A bit disappointed with our visit to The York Hotel. Staff were generally nice. Room looked nice but on the second day the air conditioning broke down and couldn't be fixed until the following day. There was a jug but we couldn't find tea, coffee etc. Found it hidden away on the 3rd day in a wee nook above the bar fridge and to our horror, the cups were dirty. As in they had the previous occupants coffee still dried up in the bottom of the cups. Meals were average and rather expensive.

title: Room was great... front of house not so much
desc: York Hotel is located just off Orchard Road and is easily accessible by walking up the hill from the station. On arrival we entered the spacious lobby and this is where we encountered the front of house staff. They ignored us for 10 minutes instead choosing to count their money and when we said "can we check in" we were told yes but still had to wait for them to finish. Fair to say it wasn't a great start for the hotel. Once we were able to check in the process was reasonably pain free and we were sent off to our quadruple room. The room itself was very spacious and the beds were clean and comfortable. The bathroom again was very spacious including a bath! The complimentary water was a nice touch after a hot day in Singapore. I would stay here again however I think

title: Needs a redo
desc: The rooms are really large and the location is convenient. We stayed here as part of a tour but would never have selected it on our own. Had that old hotel smell, and the internet connection was weak. The bathroom is unacceptable. Floor to ceiling white 4x4 tiles, old bathtub shower combo, moldy grout, rusty shower curtain rod, crazy light controls at bedside table, no where to charge phones near bed. Breakfast was fine.

title: Average
desc: Booked York hotel thinking it's close to Orchard Road and Mount Elizabeth Medical Centre but it is actually quite a distance away... atleast a 15 min walk and it's a uphill walk. The rooms are average and could use a bit of refurbishment.. especially the carpets in the hallway. Toilets are rather small. The most annoying factor was that we had booked two rooms and were allocated the rooms on different floors. Your room key card gives you access only to your respective floor so to visit the rest of our party we needed to go to the bell desk and a hotel staff to come and use their key card for access. Sometimes this process took atlesst 15 min as the bell captains were also assisting other guest with their bags. I understand this is done for security but most hotels usually

title: York hotel Singapore family of 6
desc: Had a pleasant stay at this hotel as I am not too fussy a traveller. It is slightly cheaper than staying on Orchard itself but I would say the following were disappointing- Mould in bathroom Paint peeling off in bathroom Small bathroom size Smelly damp carpet (adding to my son's cough) No extraction fan so the steam in bathroom lingers and fogs up the mirror for a very long time Lack of power points in rooms big disappointment Waiting a day for interconnecting rooms Bitter taste of York water Swimming pool - NO lifeguard (shocking) and NOT heated and rather small No outdoor leisure sports i.e. Basketball court Hilly walk to Orchard - not good with pushchair. May I add our friends who also booked at exactly the same time in room 702 (we were 530 and 531) got a

title: Family trip to Singapore
desc: York Hotel is a great value for money as far as staying with Family is concerned. The location is excellent, ambience is great and above all very good, responsive, helpful n courteous staff. If they improve upon the valur they provide in their offering of food, this would be a one of the best hotels to stay in Singapore

title: Good Location
desc: Stayed here for two nights during vacation to Singapore and use the family room for 4 people. It is 5 -10 minutes walking distance from Paragon shopping mall and Orchard Road. So location is the main reason for us to choose this hotel. Good sleeping experience. However, since this is not a new hotel, I felt the furniture and the overall look of the hotel needs improvement. Overall a good experience.

title: Hugely disappointed
desc: Please only book this hotel if you are here just to sleep - nothing else! I usually try to be more positive and objective when reviewing hotels. The hotel room is quite spacious, aircond not too cold, bed ok (not comfy but can sleep), clean room. 1. The hotel though 'near' to Orchard, if you want to walk to it from Orchard road via Elizabeth road, you need to walk UPHILL.. and if you're in heels, it's torturing after a long day. The road is quite quiet too - so don't walk alone, even though this is Singapore. 2. The free wifi connection though may be ok for social media surfing, isn't good enough if you need to connect to it for work via your laptop. Took more than 5 mins just for my airline website to load. And when I called to inform reception of the issue, it seems that

title: Mrs
desc: Posistion was Brilliant. Breakfast very good. Room average. Beds very comfortable. Linen nice. No complaints. Easy walk to Orchard Road and eating places. Bit of a slope walking back but we were both in our 70 s. Safe area with hospital in the same street and lovely homes surrounding hotel. Highly recommend.

title: Good Value But Could Be Better!
desc: The Good: 1. Location was pretty good as you would have access to both Orchard Rd and Scotts Rd. 2. Cleanliness 3. Decent amenities The Bad 1. Really outdated 2. Didn't get a luxurious feel 3. Slow WiFi So to expound, Location is good with access to 2sides of Orchard Rd. I would normally go down to Orchard Rd. through the mostly residential Elizabeth Rd. and out to Orchard through Paragon. Coming back, I'd walk back past Lucky Plaza, Tang's and Far East Plaza and go through the parking of the Goodwood Hotel. Convenience store access is also easier through Goodwood with the 7/11 at the Far East Plaza. That said, it wasn't VERY near, and it would be an uphill hike to go back to the hotel. Room was also clean and generally in good condition. A lot of reviewers have

title: Nice Hotel with Great Location
desc: I've stayed there with my family for 4 nights. Clean , quiet environment with friendly staffs. 7 minutes walk to Orchard street , arrived to Takashimaya and Ion Orchard. Easily accessible to MRT with different foods available in Malls. We had enjoyed the stayed and would recommend to choose York Hotel.

title: Very large rooms, but starting to look very tired & run down
desc: Our family (wife and 2 kids aged 4 and 7) as well as the in-laws have stayed at this hotel many times now, with the last visit being only a couple of weeks ago. Unlike previous visits to Singapore, we chose not to stay at this hotel for the full duration of our visit due to the fact the hotel rooms are really are starting to show their age and are in need of renovating - as you would have noticed by all the other comments on TripAdvisor for this hotel lately. Thankfully it appears that hotel management have acknowledged this and they've advised in the comments below that the hotel is due for a renovation later this year. Regardless of what room you pick at this hotel they're all nice and big with plenty of room and the location of the hotel to the main shopping strip on

title: Good staycation but marred by porter's attitude
desc: Stayed a night for family staycation...parked the car and tried to figure out where lobby entrance was. In the end, made my way to main entrance up a flight of stairs to enter the hotel. Was dragging a luggage with me and so was my daughter who was behind me. A large group of tourists were congregated at bottom of the flight of stairs and i was trying to squeeze past while handling my luggage and walking stick (i have fibromyalgia and need the cane for walking and balance). Just as i started up the flight of stairs, i heard one of the porters say in a rather annoyed tone with local accent: "got lift there, use the lift lah?!"...i didnt want to spoil my staycation which was to celebrate my husband's belated birthday so i let it go and continued making my way up the stairs. There

title: Great stay
desc: Excellent location right near orchard road with plenty of dining and shopping all around. We travelled as a family of 6, do had two interconnecting rooms with roll seats in each, so the rooms were a bit cramped but would be fine without the extra beds. The fact that they guarantee interconnecting rooms and the breakfast was the selling point for us. Breakfast was great, loads of options available. Recommend for family's travelling

title: Hardly value.
desc: There are some quite good features at this hotel. The room was large and quiet, the pool was fine, the breakfast adequate with attentive staff. Otherwise it is a bit tired. We arrived to find the previous guests' left overs in the fridge - not a good start. But perhaps the worst feature was the lack of service in the lobby. Nothing in the way tourists brochures or information could be seen. On request, one map was produced from under the counter. The position is okay being about a 10 minute walk to the nearest station on the major shopping precinct on Orchard Road. If we return to Singapore we will look elsewhere.

title: Tired Rooms
desc: We stayed in the York during April 2017. While our stay in Singapore was really enjoyable, I had some doubts about the York. It would be difficult to describe it as 4 star due to the fact that the rooms are, by and large, just plain tired. They badly need a facelift in order to bring the place up to scratch. On the plus side, the Wi-Fi was good, the fridge in the room was really handy and there is a lovely pool. The location is ok but you have to be prepared to use the excellent metro system if you plan on getting around to a few places in the city itself.

title: Great location for family accommodation
desc: My first impression of the hotel were good. The staff were very friendly and helpful. We had a family room which was massive. I did find that the bathroom let the standard down with a lot of mould in the edges/grout. In saying that the location was just a 5 minute walk from Orchard St where we were able to find shops, food and public transport. We felt very safe in the area. There is only local traffic so very quiet. There is a pool and gym, you Just need to ask the staff where to go as it is not very well signed. It cost around $50 - $70 to travel with 8 people from the airport to the hotel. Tv worked well with LOTS of stations and the wifi worked well, with no issues.

title: Very ordinary but fab location
desc: The hotel is in a great location close to orchard. Rooms are large and reasonably priced by Singapore standards. Service is atrocious. Apart from a few members of staff who try, others seem unbothered about giving a positive customer experience. Breakfast is standard quality with a mixture of Asian and western.

title: Overall a pleasant stay!
desc: Stayed in York Hotel's Deluxe Suite for a weekend staycation with friends, this is a relatively nice hotel that‚Äôs clean and spacious. Toilet amenities were great as well, no negative experience. Will love to come back again!

title: Loved this hotel
desc: We stayed in the 4 person family room. Loved the room. One night there was sport on and you could hear the parties going on outside, but the other 2 nights were quiet. Very close to walk to shopping on Orchard Road. Ate at the restaurant, food and service was Great! On the last morning daughter and I treated ourselves to having our nails done. Very lovely job and reasonably priced.

title: Hygiene concern of hotel room
desc: We had the most shocking hotel experience in all our travels on 26th April 2017! The bed in this hotel room was stained and soiled with urine but was covered up by a protector cover. Not until we got into the bed and detected a strange smell and insisited for a fresh changed of bedding that we discovered the stain and soiled mattress. It was stinky high heaven with a stain clearly visible.

title: Loved the family room. Great location.
desc: I stayed in the family room that could fit 4 persons and we loved it! It was very spacious. The Mount Elizabeth Hospital and Orchard Road are just within walking distance. Lots of shopping malls are in the surrounding area. It's very easy to find restaurants and supermarkets too. Will definitely come back again to this hotel.

title: A Great Experience
desc: A Great stay, We stayed on the 16th floor. The rooms were superb, very clean, very spacious, great service, great WiFi, friendly staff. A special thanks to the bell desk they are very customer oriented and helpful they will help plan your day and your departure, very hands on.Great breakfast could eat it for 7 days in a row and still find a variety. The kids love the place. It is located very near to the shopping area and restaurants. other buildings accessible at walking distance are Paragon, Lucky Plaza and Takashimaya

title: Good Value for Family
desc: I stayed in family room, and it is really spacious, especially if you are travelling with children, there are plenty of room for them to play or even run around. The hotel is a bit tired I guess. The bathroom is quite small compared to the bedroom, and they still use the bathtub, so you have to jump in to the tub even though you just want a quick shower. Location wise, it is really close to Mount Elizabeth Hospital (I have some doctor appointments in this hospital). So it is so convenient to stay in this hotel. Internet is a bit slow for Singapore standard, or is it because I only use the complimentary access. Sometimes we had issue in logging in to the wifi. Maybe I will comeback here in the future, but I might want to try to stay elsewhere.

title: Good price, good facilities
desc: Located near to the hospital and shopping center. Food was nice. Big portion imo. They provide the ironing tools in the room. Room nice and quite big. I stay there in may and june. Last time they having renovation and during the day its so noisy. Business center is provided without extra charge! üòÉ What is need to be improve is the fitness center, small.. But i found only me who using it so its fine lol.. Also the receptionist, during the checkout checkin time, always long quequing line. Last time in june i have to que for 30min.

title: Good hotel
desc: Stayed 5 nights in a family room. Clean and tidy. Ate in the restaurant one night and the food was good but the drinks pricey. Would stay again the location is good. All staff were friendly and helpful.

title: Tired, unclean and very disappointed!!
desc: I normally stay st the Elizabeth Hotel across the road from here but unfortunately they were fully booked and my travel agent suggested this hotel. On arrival the foyer showed some promise and looked inviting. The receptionist was very polite and had told me that they were going to upgrade my booked room (most hotels do this to make you feel like your special). After checkin I proceeded to the my upgraded room and as soon I entered my mind immediately thought that if this was an upgrade what the heck was the original room standard? What disappointment overcame my mind. I was exhausted from my flight and had no energy left to go back and demand a change. After a solid nights sleep I decided to have a look around the hotel and quickly realised the rest of the hotel looked

title: Attentive
desc: We stayed six nights at this hotel, a total of 18 room nights. We, children, were in Superior rooms, and our parents were in a Deluxe. Very attentive staff from the entrance, reception desk, dining room, maintenance and housekeeping. But, I think it would have been much better if they had extra staff to speed up the checking in and out process at the front desk.

title: A bit tired but serviceable
desc: Recently spent 3 nights at the York Hotel while on holidays in Singapore. Here are a few of my thoughts. LOCATION This is located close to ‚Äòorchard road‚Äô which is a quite famous touristic shopping district. Although I appreciated the wide selection of foods available in the various food courts, I actually wasn‚Äôt impressed with Orchard road itself, which really just specializes in high end retail that you would never really buy unless you had more money than sense. Most of the tourist sites were near marina bay and this required at least 45 minutes of travel via the subway, with the closest station located around 1km from the hotel (Orchard station). It was a bit of an uphill walk. Alternatively a taxi to this area (not a bad option at night) was around 10 dollars for memory.

title: Good location, reasonable hotel
desc: Hotel is in a good location for Orchard and everything that offers. Hotel was OK without being great. Front of house service levels were less than great with several instances of really slow service. No bar but restaurants service alcohol but, like most of Singapore, it's very expensive with a small beer costing S$12. Overall, it was a good place to stay but service levels need to improve for us to return.

title: Not fit for 4 star ratings
desc: We stayed in this hotel with family for 3 nights and the room was filed with smoking smell. We asked to change to non smoking room but they never heard our request. Bathroom is very small.outside noise is disturbing the inside guests.will not recommend.

title: Unimpressed by the dirty rooms.
desc: Chose this hotel as it is close to orchard road and the ratings online aren't terrible. However cleanliness was a problem!! Ants and dusts are everywhere... bathroom (and other facilities) looks ill maintained. My friend and I stayed for the 2 nights that we paid for and moved to another hotel that was cheaper and much better for the rest of our trip.

title: quite friendly ,central
