desc: Have just returned from a week in Singapore staying at this Hotel, for 5 friends travelling together all over 70, this was a perfect place to use as a base, very central to Orchard road main shopping area good restaurants close by, the rooms are large and comfortable while a little dated in d√©cor there were renovations happening while we were there, the restaurant is excellent and surprisingly as inexpensive as the near by cafe's , staff on the front desk were friendly and helpful on our arrival after a tiring flight as was the bell boy who took our luggage to our rooms and showed us all how everything worked AND refused a tip saying "it is our pleasure to have you here " taxis are readily available and inexpensive just $3 for a trip down or up the hill which seemed to get

title: Needs refurbishment
desc: I used this Hotel for a short stop over in Singapore for my way back to Europe. Compared to other 4 start hotels in Singapore I would say it's more a 3 star. The choice of food at the breakfast is medium and the rooms are really old fashioned.

title: Perfect Stay
desc: We had a very enjoyable stay at York Hotel for 4 nights. Location is perfect, minutes away from the main shopping district, Orchard Road. Room is perfectly fine, staffs are very polite and we would definitely be back when we visit Singapore next time.

title: Good value for money
desc: Decent place Close to orchard road, 10 minute walk max to paragon shopping mall Our family room was quite a big one , got a free upgrade Recommended if you want a decent affordable place closer to the very vibrant ORCHARD ROAD

title: Good hotel with good facilities
desc: very organized staff. polite and helpful. we had a great stay. rooms are nicely appointed and spacious. all amenities provided in room. breakfast buffet was a good spread and varied each day. room service menu was also quite extensive. we did not use the pool but was informed of the hotel facilities (such as pool and restaurants etc.,) when we checked in. perhaps more staff are needed at the front office - there was a bit of a queue for check in/ check out.

title: Mr troy
desc: Crappy room bad service didn't check us in straight away saying room wasn't ready go get something to eat. Come back and gave us a different room to the original room. Didn't show us to our room and the lights didn't work

title: Awesome
desc: I am a kid from Viettravel tour and I stayed there for two nights and I have to say that this hotel is perfect. I love the breakfast. It's delicious. The attitude of the hotel is perfect too. I also love the apple juice there. Don't you ever throw it away pls

title: York is a Good Hotel
desc: We Stayed here for two nights during vacation to Singapore and use the family room for 3 people. It is 5 -10 minutes walking distance from Paragon shopping mall and Orchard Road. So location is the main reason for us to choose this hotel. When we stayed there, we found that the location was very good. The room had all the necessity equipments. It was quite clean although it seemed a bit old... bathroom was clean and the bed was comfy. TV channel was limited and the staff were quite nice. We'll be back soon.

title: Best Location
desc: Although its quite old hotel but the location was good , easy looking for foods also The rooms itself quite convenience & the light at bathroom & room is enough If you travelling most out of the hotel , I recommended this hotel

title: No good service
desc: The hotel is located in downtown on Orchard road...quite old but not bad. Service is quite poor compared with the money you paid. No adapter service for guests and very small swimming pool. It's for Kids.

title: Handy to Orchard Road
desc: When we arrived the room we were allocated was noisy during the day as there were extensive refurbishing works going on. When we requested a change of rooms due to the noise, Management changed our room and upgraded us for which we were very grateful, as we were staying 8 nights. Beds and pillows were very comfortable. Breakfast in the White Rose Cafe was buffet style, with a huge range of hot and cold foods available, both Asian and international, with fresh fruits, cereals and all types of breads and eggs (boiled, fried and omelettes) We also got Room Service a few times, and the meals were tasty and we didn't have to wait too long for them to arrive. We caught taxis several times, and it seemed that we waited no more than 5 minutes as the York is a popular place for pickups

title: Family friendly
desc: We had a nice and fun stay at york hotel Stayed for 3 nights. Location was just a walk away from the shopping center and also Lucky plaza. I booked for the family room good for 4 person and it was just nice to bond with your family especially we are 4 in the room. The room was spacious enough for my son to walk around and play in the room. It was clean and they also have comfortable bed. The only thing that I think they should improve is they should have wheelchair friendly bathroom. I booked 2 rooms the other room is good for 3 pax room and my aunt couldnt shower for she needs to be in the bathtub just to take a bath. Also upon arrival, because it was 2am in the morning when we arrived at the hotel. No one helped us carry our bag from the outside going up to the lobby. I

title: Not worth it
desc: The hotel is old. Bathroom is a bit gross. I would not stay in this hotel again will definitely pay more to stay in a much better hotel. The pictures on their website are so misleading. The bed is so not comfy and small.

title: Great for big families üëçüèΩ
desc: We loved it here. Big rooms and very clean. There is nothing grand about this hotel, simple, tidy, big rooms and very basic. The pool is ok size and gym is very basic. Hotel cafe food is very average. Location is superb and great value for money.

title: Good location, average hotel
desc: I often stay at the York Hotel in Singapore as it is only a few minutes walk down to Paragon Mall on Orchard Rd., Mt Elizabeth Hospital, or Lucky Plaza. From the rear entrance of the hotel you can access Stephens Rd shopping area and the famous Goodwood Hotel. My last stay at this hotel was on 26 July, 2017. As a solo, female traveller, I feel quite safe at this hotel as it attracts many guests and the area is full of locals and tourists. Although this hotel is starting to show signs of wear and tear, the nightly rate is reasonable and the rooms are large, spacious and comfortable. However, the light switches can be complicated to work out as they are located through the bedside table... Another plus for the York Hotel is the great food in their coffee shop and friendly

title: Not a business hotel
desc: Photos can be deceiving. The hotel is undergoing renovation and the lobby and restaurant are done up so they look nice and modern. Once you enter the elevator and head towards the rooms, you will notice that the hotel is showing its age. Like noted by some of the other travellers, if you have noisy neighbour then you are screwed. Mine was noisy, banging around late at night and talking and laughing loudly early in the morning. There is one power point at the desk. There is coffee and kettle but they give cheap coffee. The bathroom smells like sewerage. If you are just after a comfortable after a long day shopping at Orchard Rd, then it is fine. It is literally next door to two hospitals so there's people staying here while having surgery or visiting relatives. Otherwise

title: Excellent!
desc: Very good budget hotel with free buffet breakfast and it is 5mins walk to orchard road! The location is very nice for the price. You wont go wrong with this place. The bathroom is 4/5 too a bit old but good enough!

title: Amazing Service from David Chris
desc: We come to Singapore 2-3 times a year and always stay at the york hotel.. We are always greeted with a big smile, the staff are very friendly. Amazing service from David Chris!! I can't express how much he helps us out on our trips there.. we always stay in the premier rooms which have 1 double king and 2 singles The room itself is huge for a hotel room, spacious area where my kids love to play.. the food is great and service is too. I can't recommend this place enough.. we have always looked around at other places but money wise and the friendly service makes us always end up back at York Hotel! Thanks guys üòÑ

title: Not worth the money
desc: We had booked this hotel thru booking.com We selected double superior room with breakfast for 2 Adults and 1 child of age 8. The hotel looks very old, reception staffs are very u friendly, there is no warm welcome. The rooms are very back dated and old kind. It cant be a 4 star hotel. It looks like less than 3 stars. Breakfast is very average. Now we are told that the breakfast is only for 2 people. While we hv booked the room with breakfast for 2 Adults and 1 child. How can that make sense. So the manager tells us that we should write to booking.com as they are the agents whom we booked thru and the room we selected was for 2 Adults. In our confirmation from booking .com we selected a room for 3 of us. We really didnt get the point. We will never stay here again. We dont

title: Location..location..location
desc: The best part of this hotel is the location within walking distance to Orchard Road and Scotts Road. Room is spacious but needs renovation. Check in & check out was smooth & efficient. Buffet breakfast is good with several variety to choose from. Ramli at the breakfast service is friendly and attentive giving us tips which local dishes we should try to eat. Thank you! Jacuzzi outdoor is only lukewarm, but the kids love the swimming pool.

title: Renovation can be very disturbing
desc: York Hotel is under renovation and it is extremely noisy. We arrived to hotel around 23.00pm due to coming from long overseas trip and need to have proper rest, nevertheless we hardly slept during our stay. The walls are incredibly tin and sounds travel everywhere. You can easily hear your next room noises, snoring and other guests' conversation, can you imagine if there is also a renovation!! Our 4 nights stay became like a nightmare ! I have informed their managers and receptionist, however no action has been taken. Actually this hotel should not accept any guest during their renovation, they are giving huge discomfort to their guests and I indeed so much regret that we have stayed this hotel and definitely will not come back this hotel again !

title: Did not change the bed sheet
desc: We stayed for 4 days, from the first night till the third night, the bed sheet was not changed. Next day in the morning, I've asked to change the bed sheet. But when I came back at 9 pm the bed sheet wasn't changed!! I complained to the reception and she answered me in a rude expression. And then they sent a housekeeper to change, so I waited the housekeeper to change the bed sheet. I was standing there looking at the housekeeper changing... at that time it was 9.30 pm Then, they did not give us another tea and coffee sachet after we used the last one. As I know, every hotel must give it to the guests when they clean the room every morning. This is not a low budget hotel, but they treat me like I stay in a low budget hotel!!

title: Elegant property
desc: A mix of Victorian and modern architecture, this property is located within 5 minutes of walking distance from Orchard Road (a great shopping hub and activity area). Yet the place is quite quiet and peaceful. Courteous and pleasant staff and overall a good experience. Breakfast venue gets little crowded and has a few minutes of wait team during peak hours so may need to have a few extra minutes at hand if you are rushing out and want to have a quick bite.

title: Breakfast not worth the value. Next time will not buy breakfast package. Better Room Only
desc: Since my hotel voucher was Room Only, was offered at Reception breakfast package for 2 pax but unfortunately had to buy 3 days in a row. Wanted to buy only 1 day but had no choice. Bought 3 days in a row and was greatly disappointed when on first morning we had breakfast at 9am, most of items were not quickly replenished. And breakfast menu was monotonous neither interesting nor tasty. Stir fried vegetables looked more like Vegetable drenched in thick soup. Choice of main course was very basic. Carbohydrates such as bee hoon/kwe tiauw was also plainly served. Condiments for porridge consisted only 2 types of sauce, 1 bowl of spring onions, 1 chilli oil. Too basic for a 4 star hotel. Room was comfy although we were misinformed by concierge that our room was in the new wing

title: Value for money, great location but needs an update
desc: Stayed at the York Hotel for two nights. 3-5 minutes walking distance from Paragon shopping mall and Mount Elizabeth Orchard hospital. Yet, it doesn't get bothered by the noises from the nearby busy Orchard Road. Spacious classic styled hotel rooms unlike modern compact hotels. Good sleeping experience. However, since this is not a new hotel and has been there for quite some time, I felt the furniture and the overall look and feel of the hotel needs improvement. Also, my room had a sealed door separating it from the room next to me but I could hear their conversations and the sound from the TV. I'm sure they heard me too and wondered the same that why there is a door between two rooms in a hotel! Didn't like the toiletries in the bathroom and felt they were of very cheap

title: Good location
desc: This hotel was just 5 to 10 minutes away from Orchard Road. Right behind Paragon Mall and just few blocks away from Mount Elizabeth Hospital. When we stayed there, we found that the location was very good. The room had all the necessity equipments. It was quite clean although it seemed a bit old... bathroom was clean and the bed was comfy. TV channel was limited and the staff were quite nice. We'll be back

title: Top Class Service
desc: I have been staying in this hotel each time my husband visits Singapore. And each visit has been a delightful experience when checking in the hotel. Their reception staff, Ms. Rosemary has made the experience wonderful. She will take the effort of understanding the requirements of the customer and ensuring satisfaction. She will also take the effort of recognizing us each time when we reside in this hotel. Definitely a TOP CLASS in delighting the customer experience.

title: Horrible food
desc: I'm sitting here at their Penang Hawkers Fair and getting upset at myself for getting tricked into this total gastronomic disaster. Me and my family could have gotten every dish at any hawkers center for the price we paid of this total buffet.

title: only location
desc: what i can say the location is top near by the Famous orchard road the staff is ok , except Nenny who is super pro and warm welcome the Food...chinese one there is an awful smell every where the room really needs upgrade in emergency nice pool dont pay for breakfast and go to paragon near by

title: So Bad!!!!
desc: Currently I am stay at the York Hotel Room 929. First night experienced the Room is so noisy, the noisy sound come from above my Room, i has complaining but the noise come back again tomorrow! Secondly, the lady at front Shop is not even smile while she was serving us nor I am asking my room card. She need to learn how to served customer with happy Face. The size of the bed is so small, single bed?! First time experienced. Overall is totally regret stay this hotel!

title: Non-existent service in general
desc: I was there over the weekend with my friends and we had a one night stay-cation in the premier room. Maybe i am used to receiving some form of service from hotel front desk personnel but York hotel really shocked me. It's not as though i always stay in top notch 5 star hotels, i am referring to my experiences at boutique hotels in Singapore and overseas. 3-4 star establishments in Thailand or Taiwan in general. At the front desk of York Hotel, there were 3 front desk personnel but i had to call out for attention as they were in their own conversations or looking downwards. There are only 3 or 4 counters if i am not wrong. Later in the night, we went out for dinner but my friend had to urgently go back to the room to collect his wallet. He misplaced the hotel card key in

title: Value for money
desc: Arrived early and was offered for additional sgd100 can get the room early (6:30am).. when agreed turned out no room is avail ‚òπÔ∏è Got the room at 1 pm only to get a smoking room (good if you are in room smoker but am not)..all non smoking room are fully booked - lesson learnt always specify requirement upon booking Location is great and is value for money!!

title: Good
desc: Whilst only there for one night on a stopover and with three young children in tow, the hotel provided everything we needed. Location and proximity to Orchard Road was within a short walk down the hill. Staff were pleasant and the room was clean.

title: Be a Loyalty Member to enjoy benefits
desc: I like the convenient location and the spacious comfy room. Decided to join the Hotel Loyalty Membership Programme as recommended by a reception staff to enjoy benefits and reward points when I book direct with the hotel. A female staff who assisted me with the online registration was really patient and helpful. Will be back at York Hotel mid January with my family for 2 nights.

title: Fantastic Location & Spacious Rooms
desc: A good choice if you looking for hotels to stay near to Orchard Road. We booked the Premier Room for 4 persons which was really spacious and is smoke free. The recent stay with family was our third time there, we have got ourselves so familiar with the surroundings - shops & eateries, and is really easy to move around. Even my 2 young teenage kids are able to roam by themselves and make their way back safely to the hotel. A female reception staff introduced me to join the Hotel Loyalty Programme at no cost to enjoy the benefits and reward points for members. She was so patient in assisting me with the registration. I will check out the room promotions for members and will be back again in January.

title: Disappointing Stay by my Guest
desc: I just put up my friend for her short visit to Singapore at York Hotel as the location is close to Orchard Road. It's my first time doing that. The room was large but dated. What deter me from recommending York Hotel is my friend's feedback - I will not want to stay here again. Why? During check-in, there was no help with luggage as one of the entrance was not manned. Tried to check-in at 1.30 pm, was told that the room was not ready and to be back after 4 pm. A good hotel would have ensured that the guest be checked in no later than 2 pm and a room would be ready at least 1 hour before. During check out, I went to pick up my friend to the Airport. The Bell did help, but there was a very rude and unpleasant encounter when he stormed off after I refused him to

title: Very pleasant stay
desc: We arrived at York Hotel on the 27 Dec 2017 and departed on the 29th. The hotel is beautiful. The entrance, lobby and restaurant to the left immediately give a great impression. Our room for a family of 4 was fantastic. It was very modern, well maintained and equipped, and very big with 2 large king size beds. There was so much storage space with a walk in closet. Concierge service was friendly and efficient and we booked our tours for the next day from there. Breakfast was also great. We unfortunately did not get to use the pool area due to the short time, but we spent a few minutes there on our departure morning and it was so beautiful and inviting that we were sad not to have spent more time at the hotel for the kids sake. We would most definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Good stay.
desc: Arrived after night flight. Checked in at hotel by 9.30. Reception was very accomodating with Rosemary Chua providing excellent service and geting us the 3 rooms early so that we could freshen up instead of waiting till 2pm. Very congenial service from Rosemary. Thank you. One draw back was the breakfast. I think it could have a little more variety as one would get tired of eating similar buffets for 4 mornings ! But this our secong stay at York and close proximity to Orchard and Scotts attractive with mrt and buses available frequently. Not to mention the shopping on Orchard and the evening activity during christmas with all those lights though I've seen better orchard road light ups in previous years in dec. Good hotel for family. Courteous staff even at bell and arranging a

title: Wont recommend
desc: First time staying here. Disspointrd with my stay. Reached there nobody bothers to help me with the luggage as my wife is with the kids. And i need to park the car. Check in is slow and disorganise. No queue line They gave me a room upgrade. Thanks for it but the upgrade to family suit does not give me the 'wow' feeling. Went out for breakfast came back say maintainance team in my room without informing me. Check out was worse experience. Bo queue line. i was standing behind someone by the counter and another person was on next counter. Ms Nemay or something went and ask another person for other counter serve. I was like wtfi wan in queue for. She told me dont worry check out is very fast. But the point is i was in the queue before that person. Wont recommend to go this

title: Nice stay.
desc: The check-in process at the front desk was quick with no problems and was given 3 access cards. To get to your room you had to use the access cards in the lift to which floor your room was located. Once you get to your room you use the access card to enter your room. I found the room was clean until tried to move the bed and found an empty Pringle's chips container that housekeeping had missed and so was not sure how long it had been there. The bathroom looked a but dated but that was fine as this was a short stay. There is a restaurant on the ground floor where you could have breakfast or dinner but did not try it as went out and wanted to try other places. This hotel is around a 5 minute walk from Orchard Road and Paragon. Next door to Paragon is Toast Box where you can

title: Nice hotel but rooms need updating
desc: We arrived at 1.30am tired and weary. The gentleman that checked us in was matter of fact, no expression, no nice greeting. We actually got the feeling that he would have preferred not to be there at that time of night. We were given our keys and told where the elevators were. Stepping out of the elevators you could tell that the halls needed a good makeover. Upon entering our rooms the smell was terrible and smelt like mould. The rooms are basic, the bathroom tiles needed replacing and one was coming off the wall! and there was mould. However the buffet breakfast was lovely as was the few times we had dinner. The staff were very courteous as were the bell boys. It is close to Orchard Rd which is only walking distance which was a plus. Our checkout was completely

title: Nice historical hotel
desc: We stayed at Deluxe Room for 5 nights. Here are some points about this hotel: + great location, about 10 mins walking to Orchard, but not crowdy. + It is a historical hotel, but well maintained. All electronic devices are still working perfectly. + the room is bigger than average room in Singapore. + the bed is very comfortable. - we don't like the breakfast. There are not too many options and the quality could have been better for 4-stars-hotel. For 28 Sing Dollar is overpriced. However since they have a great location, you can breakfast also at Orchard. - the floor was not cleaned properly, we could find the rest of the food on the carpet and the rest of make up powder after 2 days. - the room, in which our parents stayed was renovated. However they replaced the bathroom

title: good location
desc: the York hotel is a 10 minute walk to the orchard road center and paragon shopping center. the staff were efficient and friendly. the hotel is 'tired looking' and as a result is undergoing floor by floor renovations. if you stay here request a room far away from any renovation as the noise is unpleasant particularly in late afternoon. my request for a room change was granted quickly with little fuss. I think any hotel you book with should include statements about renovation or construction in the area as it can interfere with a pleasant stay.

title: Overall a very pleasant stay
desc: Great location, few mins walk to Orchard Road,near Mount Elizabeth Hospital,Room was bigger then average,comfortable ,wi-fi was fast enough,staffs ware smiling every time i see them,so much helpful for everything,..we arrived in early morning but they arrange a room for us before 9 am..i told them I am not going to have breakfast tomorrow as i need to go hospital so they arranged me a breakfast on that morning i have just checked in...That breakfast was also awesome..overall a very good experience for me...

title: Fantastic!
desc: There were 3 families staying at this hotel for 4 nights. The hotel is a short walk to Orchard Avenue/ Road. There's also a medical centre very close by should you need it. Having an asthmatic kid, this is a great advantage. Our room for 3 people was just beautiful and very spacious. Comfortable beds, clean rooms, a great shower and bath, very happy with it. We opted out of the breakfast due to its expense however there is a MacDonalds 5 mins away. The outdoor pool was refreshing and not too cold, just lovely. One thing I would suggest is for some outdoor umbrellas as there is no shade there. For a fair skinned person, this is not good. Had a truly lovely stay at the York Hotel! Would happily go back there.

title: Beautiful hotel
desc: stayed at this hotel with family this week, pretty much comfortable stay. Hotel looks magnificent with very spacious family rooms. Very near to the orchard room everything is just walking distance . Though not happy with the breakfast spread(being a vegetarian). Would specially thank Ms Mary Ann the lobby manager she was very generous and kind.

title: Great hotel close to Orchard Avenue
desc: We stayed for 4 nights in the family suite, a huge King bed and two twins in a big room. We have been to Singapore 3 times and this is the best hotel we have stayed at. The room was clean, not freezer cold as they can be in Singapore and very spacious. The pool is amazing and big, perfect for a dip after sightseeing. We were travelling with extended family and all the kids loved the pool. It could however do with some umbrellas especially for the fair skinned like me. It is very close to Orchard Avenue which is a few minutes walk away and also close to the MRT which is convienant for sightseeing. We didn't eat at the hotel as there are so many options around Orchard and breakfast is Singapore hotels is always very expensive. The staff are also very friendly at the hotel

title: Lovely hotel great location
desc: Stayed at this hotel for 4 nights. Hotel is in a fantastic location being only a couple of streets from Orchard road. It is comfortable and clean. Huge pool for the kids to play in. Staff were helpful especially the doorman who was always happy and had some great suggestions on things to do. Stayed on a higher floor which gave us a view of the city. Given the costs of staying in Singapore this hotel is a great find and I'll be back on my next trip.

title: Lovely hotel great location
desc: Stayed at this hotel for 4 nights. Hotel is in a fantastic location being only a couple of streets from Orchard road. It is comfortable and clean. Huge pool for the kids to play in. Staff were helpful especially the doorman who was always happy and had some great suggestions on things to do. Stayed on a higher floor which gave us a view of the city. Given the costs of staying in Singapore this hotel is a great find and I'll be back on my next trip.

title: 3 day stopover in Singapore
desc: Older hotel in central Singapore. Location excellent. Upgraded to very large family room. Facilities a little basic but adequate and good price. Would stay again for quick stopover, probably not for a special occasion however. Well located near Mount Elizabeth Hospital for relatives.

title: 3 day stopover in Singapore
desc: Older hotel in central Singapore. Location excellent. Upgraded to very large family room. Facilities a little basic but adequate and good price. Would stay again for quick stopover, probably not for a special occasion however. Well located near Mount Elizabeth Hospital for relatives.

title: Singapore visit for medial treatments
desc: We stayed 4nights. This hotel is very convenient as its situated next to mount Elizabeth hospital. This is a ideal hotel if you seek medical assistance from mt. Elizabeth hospital.also walking distance to many famous shopping complexes specially orchard rd, scotts rd ect.and for business meetings.

title: Singapore visit for medial treatments
desc: We stayed 4nights. This hotel is very convenient as its situated next to mount Elizabeth hospital. This is a ideal hotel if you seek medical assistance from mt. Elizabeth hospital.also walking distance to many famous shopping complexes specially orchard rd, scotts rd ect.and for business meetings.

title: Was ok..
desc: This hotel is ok, I‚Äôm a little disappointed with the quality for the price I paid. Breakfast was cold, and we found mould on the bread two days in a row. Coffee was weak. Juice choices were good. Western food choices were ok. Room was big and bottled water provided was good. View was nice. Shower was in a bathtub, that was awkward to get out. Toilet paper was behind you, very awkward place to put it. Nice toiletries, double basin., Bed was comfortable. WiFi was good. Bit of a walk to orchard road, but there is no real guide in reception to show you how to get anywhere, which made it hard for us to get our bearings. They need a map, and some city brochures in reception- a guide for getting to mrt and taxis We arrived early in the morning 7am, and we got into our room

title: The Traditional Penang Hawkers‚Äô Fare
desc: Three times a year, the York Hotel invites a dozen hawkers (food stalls) from Penang for a two-week festival of Penang‚Äôs exquisite street food cuisine. This has been going on since 1986 and remains popular to this day. Stick to a winning formula! I came regularly when I lived in Singapore and was fortunate that, on three recent visits to the city, at the same time, the hawkers were back at the York Hotel. A great opportunity to treat friends or family on their home ground, but with a surprise as many residents do not know the event, its quality and its long tradition. As always, food was top class, service prompt, and plates small to ensure a quick rotation. As always, the mood was merry and cheerful. We came for lunch on the second day and I flew out of Singapore that

title: great penang buffet
desc: The penang buffer was great, gave me and my family a chance to experience what penang food is all about. The food is slightly greasy but tasty. Service was excellent ! Seemed like a popular buffet as they don't take reservations and there already a queue at 530pm when the buffet starts at 630pm.

title: Great location, efficient staff, good quality for price
desc: I stopped several times in this hotel and I think it is a very good mid range hotel. I have always arrived very early in the morning (around 7-8 a.m.) and, maybe I was lucky, but I have always received my room upon arrival. As well, they are very flexible with check out time granting me check out at 18:00 at a reasonable price. All is of course upon availability BUT, in other hotels in Singapore I was asked for the full night room charge. A thrird matching point is the location, very close to Orchard Road (approx 3 min walk), but still in a calm area. The hotel hall is very pleasent and room and other facilities pretty nice. A good address to keep in mind!

title: Nice and comfortable hotel
desc: Very nice room, full service, friendly, good location; the breakfast is very comprising, the cleanliness is super, both, room and bathroom. The location is not too far away from the center Orchard Road and good accessible. Like it.

title: Great Business Trip Hotel
desc: I came here for a 3-day training session. I spent two nights and I must say, it was all that I had expected. On a business trip, you just want fuss free accomodation that is comfortable, clean and has the essentials with good support service. I'll explain. I was on a tight schedule. I flew in on the morning of my training course and hence, needed a quick registration. They said that 9AM was too early to check-in but they did begin the process and kept my bags safe. I collected them during lunch break and proceeded to my room. When I was leaving, they were quick to hail down a taxi to once again, rush me off to Changi for my flight home. The room was clean with very comfy beds. The bathroom was nice. Room service was quick. Food was tasty. I was so busy that I never left the

title: Good Location, Average Accommodation, Inconsitent Customer Service
desc: Stayed 14th to 19th of January 2019. Not a welcoming environment at all customer service on arrival is very basic an uninviting. bell hops hiding don't want to help with bags or get door when bringing bags in or out of hotel. Reception was a very disinterested experience bear basics check in had to push for information on everything. If you dont ask you don't get any help, info on hotel. The first room we were booked into 1003 was very musty plus cleaning of the bedroom area was average no attention to detail, dusty. The bathhroom was really bad they have painted the baths in the past with expoxy paint which is used to cover up old tired baths normally only designed to last 3 years at best under normal domestic use. The bath plug area was flacking off and rusty. the edges

title: Great affordable option for Singapore
desc: York Hotel is a great option for Singapore, budget-friendly, but in the same time with all the needed comfort and quality. Awesome location, close to Orchard road and MRT. Many thanks to the staff, as they were very nice and attentive with our 3 years old son. Highly recommended, would chose it again for a future visit!

title: More Smile please
desc: We stay 5 days for our trip in Singapore. We choosed the hotel cause its just very convenient to walk to Orchad road and is in the middle of the city. The room is clean and good for us to having rest after our busy days. We were little bit annoyed with the crew/staff, they are too serious and forgot how to smile or greeting the guesses. When we asked for our welcoming drink at night time after we walk (around 9.30) they only gave us 3 instead of 4, cause they dont have anymore. They dont even say sorry for gave us three drinks. They just gave us 3, and when we asked wheres the other one, they just say we inly have three. When me and my husband came around 9pm to have snack/drinks, we can see the lady who served us just take a deep breath when we came, and so un-friendly

title: Spacious Room, Great Staycation
desc: booked the Quad Premier room for 4 of us and were pleasantly surprised when we entered! room is biiig and spacious and clean. location is behind Far East Plaza - a bit of a walk from the train station but shops and food are all easily accessible by walking down the heart of Orchard Road. staff were friendly, pool is nice, check-in and out was smooth. definitely would return again because of the size of the room for 4 pax. you don't have to squeeze and can have an enjoyable time in Orchard.

title: Best value in Singapore!
desc: We stayed here for a school sports event. It's a great location, short walk to Orchard Rd and train station, so very convenient. Great buffet breakfast and large rooms fully equipt with everything you need. A great value hotel and we'll be back.

title: Dinner at the Penang Hawker Fare
desc: Went there for dinner to celebrate a few birthdays in my family. The food was good and pretty authentic Penang hawker fare, however the dining area was very hot as the aircon was not powerful enough, we were all sweating while eating and was very uncomfortable. Some of the staff dispensing the buffet seem pretty rude at times.

title: Good value hotel in excellent location
desc: This hotel is in a great location just behind Orchard Road and close to Mount Elizabeth Hospital and Paragon Health Centre. It is easy to walk to all those locations. The room was clean, comfortable and of good size. The staff were helpful. Room service and the restaurant are a little expensive but the food was good. No room service after 11 pm.

title: Great place centrally located
desc: Have stayed there on a number of occasions and will again in March 2020. Comfortable accommodation and meals are well provided. Easy walking distance from Orchard Road and shopping. Staff always helpful and happy to help

title: Good hotel
desc: We have been here for a few nights. Good hotel. Nice room with enough space. Verry friendly staff and helpfull. There is also a swimmingpool when you want to cool down a litlle bit. Also the area of the hotel is nice. Nearby shoppingcenter and station for the MRT. So, York hotel is a good place to stay in Singapore.

title: Great Family Hotel
desc: Big room and spacious, easy access to orchard road. children friendly, most staff is willing to help and assist us didnt get a chance to use all facilities nevertheless is one of hotel to go when traveling with family

title: Good quiet hotel
desc: Nice clean hotel with no tour group staying. A nice and quiet hotel to stay. Only issue is that house keeping did not change or clean the used glasses. Front desk was friendly and accommodating to our needs.

title: Excellent location
desc: The York is in a great location, only 5 minute walk to Orchard Road. The hotel is quiet and feels safe. However the room was not clean. The bathroom had a bad tile repair job and needed a good clean. The bed, although comfortable enough, had a dirty doona cover and the valance around the mattress was covered in stains. The rooms are huge and represent good value for money, however it did not feel like a 4 star hotel.

title: Three night stop over in Singapore
desc: Stayed at the York Hotel. Wonderful big room. Clean and well presented With wonderful breakfast each morning Very happy with our stay. Staff were friendly and helpful. Very knowledgeable about local restaurants and shopping centers. Great advice regarding attractions.

title: Very nice place to stay for a week
desc: We were pleased with the cleanliness and customer service. The location is great, 5 minutes to the metro and close to the Ion Orchard mall. Never felt unsafe. If you want breakfast, try to get it included in the cost of the room as it is expensive, but that is not a reason to slight their rating - Singapore is expensive in general. The amenities are nice and I can't think of anything to complain about.

title: Great service and central location!
desc: My family and I had a wonderful experience staying at York Hotel. Rooms are clean and spacious. While location is central, and close to the bustling Orchard Road, the area is quiet; so you can be assured to have a good night's sleep. Generally, we are not a fan of hotel food; but the food is reasonably priced and authentic (our favourite is the beef hor fun). The wait staff are attentive and friendly also. We understand from the wait staff that the chef has been around for years, so the food is consistently good. We also wanted to give a special mention to Rosemary at the front desk. She is especially helpful and very hospitable and made our stay at the hotel very pleasant. We will definitely be back soon and we will recommend this hotel to our friends and family.

title: Good Hotel in a good location
desc: Location near from Orchard shopping belt. Excellent hotel. spacious lobby deluxe plus room spacious and clean bedroom spacious and clean bathroom Excellent breakfast Excellent services Helpful and charm staff

title: If you spacious space, this is the right York Hotel for you.
desc: Night manager, Narsa S. is very thoughtful. She knows exactly what to do to make you want to return to stay at York Hotel on your next visit to Singapore. This York Hotel has incredible spacious rooms.

title: Best location in my opinion
desc: At popular Orchard shopping area.Walking distance to all impotent places.Easy access. More than that the permanent staff recognized you and treat you the best way they can. from the bell captain's desk to White rose coffee shop, they look after you. Specially the services of Din and his colleagues at Bell office and Ramli at Coffee House are commendable. Great guys. Breakfast to dinner, they serve very good food and make you comfortable. Stay and experience their hospitality.

title: York Hotel review
desc: Great location, close to Orchard Road. However, the room and bathroom was very poor - shower leaking, bath and toilet filthy. Staff were generally unfriendly. This should be a 2 to 3 star hotel at best.

title: Singapore stay
desc: Excellent for family & friends to stay together in a clean hotel like York. I truly enjoyed my stay & hope to again visit here. My only recommendation would be to add some Veg items in Breakfast for people coming from India.

title: Poor risk assessment and service
desc: I guy gave me a wrong exchange, and I really don't blame that guy, it's the line manager that piss me off. Like it or not, it's your mistake to do the exchange with wrong rate, which I am willing to cooperate with you to make it right, but the manager treat me like I am a thief, and ask me to get up early and walk to other place to buy back the SDG(with a very poor exchange rate) and return to the front desk. Come on, is this how your "service line manager" treat your guest? Your mistake shouldn't bother me that much, all I need to do should be only stepping into the front desk and it's done. I consider myself is a reasonable customer, because I am also a manager for other company, I have the empathy, that's why I am willing to cooperate with you, but there are tons of the

title: good location, reasonable price easy mrt connection lots of shopping mall in walking distance, hospital nearby
desc: good location with mrt connection, reasonable price and family friendly hotel, lots of shopping mall in walking distance, Elizabeth & paragon hospital nearby. quite and less crowd area. located in orchid shopping zone.

title: York Hotel Singapore
desc: The hotel was very close to Orchard Road yet in a quiet location. It had comfortable rooms, good facilities and service. I particularly liked the well appointed gym. The restaurant serviced quality meals at a reasonable price. All in all an excellent place to stay in Singapore.

title: A Great Hotel In Singapore
desc: Thanks a lot for your patient services, providence of delicious meals, clean and comfortable room, these made me unforgettable movement in Singapore. One of the reasons how I adore your hotel is the location that situated in a quite place.

title: Holidays
desc: Very good hotel for those wanting to be close to Orchard Rd. Meals at Cafe were excellent as was the buffet breakfast. We had a king size bed and room was spacious. I asked for another suitcase stand For our second suitcase. Staff were very helpful and spoke good English. Hairdryer in and attached to a drawer in room so if you want in bathroom bring your own. Bathroom clean but getting older. We enjoyed our stay and would return .

title: Excellent
desc: My wife and I like this hotel because of its good location near the central part of Singapore with several shopping malls and restaurants. Rooms and facilities are good, services are excellent, and stall are friendly. Therefore we have stayed at this hotel 4 times during last 2 years whenever we come to Singapore.

title: Handy stopover hotel
desc: Very handy to shopping on Orchard road. Quiet and very comfortable beds and rooms. Lovely breakfasts . We were taking a few days break from a long haul flight Auckland To Marseille so York Hotel was a nice stopover

title: Recommend this hotel !
desc: Good location. The staffs are friendly. The room is very comfortable for family. Convenient to go to the department store and easy to find the convenience store around the hotel. Swimming pool is clean.

title: My first experience with York Hotel, Singapore
desc: Compared with other Hotels I have been a guest in, this hotel is average with still room to improve. My best and memorable experience is the buffet break fast was great. Also enjoyed the pool environment and Gym.

title: Dated decor and badly in need of refreshing renovation. Barely adequate facilities for a hotel at this price
desc: Some staff very helpful. Management really need to do some improvements to the facilities and consider a refreshing renovation. Other issues include: - the so-called fridges were totally inadequate to properly chill drinks. They barely reduced the temperature below room temperature. - WiFi poor quality and dropped out often - paintwork needs refreshing and tiles in the bathroom need re-grouting - Range of TV channels very poor and of zero interest to me or anyone like me (I asked others and they agreed on this) - VERY expensive for this level or quality in the rooms - Inflexible with changing bookings.

title: Enjoyed the hotel
desc: I booked the quad premier room and the room was very spacious.Our kids enjoyed the pool and we ordered food to be delivered to the pool which was very convenient. The room decor was pleasing. Clean room and bathroom. I would recommend this hotel.

title: Enjoyed the hotel
desc: I booked the quad premier room and the room was very spacious.Our kids enjoyed the pool and we ordered food to be delivered to the pool which was very convenient. The room decor was pleasing. Clean room and bathroom. I would recommend this hotel.

title: Nothing to Fault
desc: After arriving from a long haul flight it was very refreshing to be greeted by the very helpful and accommodating staff at the York Hotel. My husband, young daughter and myself loved our lovely room on the 13th floor. There were two queen sized beds which were very comfortable. The bathroom was large and had a shower over the bathtub. The room was very clean and comfortable. There was a fridge and tea and coffee making facilities. The lighting and furniture was excellent. There was no ice machine on the floor but the staff were happy to bring up a bucket of ice very promptly. The pool area is excellent, very clean and well maintained. The restaurant was fabulous, and the food exquisite. We were particularly happy that the waiter staff were very welcoming, cheerful and

title: My Amazaing Experience
desc: The staff is very accommodating as I walked at the entrance of the hotel. They automatically assisted guest who are coming. They answered queries politely with the guest. When request for room service, they attended quickly with ours needs.

title: My Amazaing Experience
desc: The staff is very accommodating as I walked at the entrance of the hotel. They automatically assisted guest who are coming. They answered queries politely with the guest. When request for room service, they attended quickly with ours needs.

title: Review for York Hotel
desc: Good hotel near Orchard Road. But if you are looking for Indian breakfast, this hotel is not for you. Mostly non- vegetarian food.Rooms are very good, spacious. Service is not very good at breakfast counter.

title: A pleasent week in Singapore
desc: The hotel location is excellent, a short walk from Orchard road. Room is nice and cozy. Pillow, bed and bedding is clean. I have a very good night sleep. Breakfast is just right. many choices from Western breakfast to Chinese and local dish.

title: They Make Your Business Their Business
desc: The 2 weeks I had to spend in Singapore for conferences, meetings and a product launch were a sure promise of long, exhausting and very hectic days. York Hotel provided me the feeling of not being out of the country and not too far from my family. It allowed me to enjoy my evenings quietly and comfortably so I could recharge. A very spacious room with clean floor carpet, a huge king-sized bed with crisp blankets and fluffy pillows. A bathroom that could fit 10 people. A big tub for my relaxing dip. The restaurant offered set or buffet meals. It has a gym that I managed to use daily and a pool that I found busy most of the time. The hotel is located very conveniently with different establishments surrounding it and whether it's the bus, a taxi, grab car or the mrt, you will never

title: Vety good hotel near by Shopping Centets
desc: Perfect Organisation, friendly staff and a large buffet for beakfast. We were there as family and also children rate the hotel as very good. Nice pool ....So we can recommend the hotel also for families.

title: Singapore Stopover
desc: What can I say about the York that hasn‚Äôt been said before. The location is great if you are looking to be in the action on Orchard Rd. Just a short walk to Tangs, Lucky Plaza and Paragon. The hotel is dated and shows its age in many areas and needs a refresh but for the price it was pleasant. Breakfast was included and had a large selection to choose from. This is our third stay in the York and will probably come back again.

title: Right location, right price.
desc: The York is an excellent hotel for your stay in Singapore. Located near the top of Orchard Road it is in the ideal location. Not overpriced, staff and rooms are wonderful and the breakfast caters for all tastes.

title: Worth to stay
desc: Wonderful place to stay. The hotel was very good in general. Starting from the reception till the room service agent were very kind. Swimming pool was perfect only water to be changed frequently......

title: Good hotel and big room
desc: I stayed for a night with my friends, the room was big and clean, the bed very comfortabe, the bathroom also clean. The staff were nice. The hotel location is near with orchard road, you can just walk to reach MRT or Bus Station. Highly recommend to stay in this hotel.

title: The location of hotel is closed to Orchard Road
desc: The prices and services are still okay and I don't see many obstacles to check in and check out. I was also impressed with the hospitality from the lobby staff. for the room in my rating the cleanliness of this hotel is very good above the average hotel in general.

title: Huge room!
desc: Booked a room for 4 adults and we were pleasantly surprised by the size of the room. It is massive! The bathroom is also very roomy. Hotel is short walk to Orchard Road and convenient to shopping. We left our baggages at the concierge after checkout as our flight is not til later. They booked us a van to the airport. We had a lovely stay.

title: Location is perfect
desc: Close to Mount Elizabeth Hospital and Orchard road. Shopping is next door. Staff is friendly and Breakfast spread is decent. No major complains but quality of the room beds can be improved. Will stay again.

title: Good location and centrally located (15-20) minutes drive from all major attractions
desc: Located at a walking distance from Orchard road malls and restaurants. Sentosa is 20 minutes drive, merlion park 10 minutes, gardens by the bay 10 minutes, Singapore Flyer 10 minutes. Overall a good place to stay for a family trip.

title: very good
desc: I have been coming to this hotel since 1996 together with my parents. The staffs are friendly and they tend to recognized the regular guests. The room has been renovated to make our stay in the hotel better. They have provided the lift near to the staircase at the lobby to make the guests easier to carry their luggage to the lobby (previously only have staircase)

title: Great experience staying in Singapore
desc: I stay 3nites here for holiday with my father & sisters. Its a nice stay because the location, the staff, the bedroom are all great. Its easy to find food, buy simcard for my phone. Sure one day we'll stay here again if we come back to Singapore. And also very easy to find transportation

title: Run of House was Overprice
desc: Room was not soundproof and the room was overprice as we booked and paid the room (run of house - superior) much more expensive than the deluxe room. It's kinda not fair. It will be good if the room type is suitable with price eventhough customers book by using online booking engines.

title: York Hotel
desc: The hotel has a nice location in the central part of Singapore. Public transport is easily accessible. Shopping is also very convenient at Orchard area. The room is very spacious compared to other hotels. The amenities are very good.

title: Nice stay with York Hotel
desc: A good location if you are visiting Singapore for medical purpose, since it is near to good hospitals in the city. Malls are also accessible, they have good customer service, clean rooms, and nice staff

title: More than average
desc: Great location and super-fast check-in and check-out. The breakfast is also nice . Enjoyable swimming pool. But the building and the rooms need renovation. Would come again and recommend to our friends.

title: Would not recommend this hotel
desc: I lost an item from my room and the hotel has not taken any responsibility. Because i was checking out the next morning they said they will look into it and took proof of the item being with me and pretended they would do everything possible to handle the matter. However, all I got was a one line email stating there is nothing they can do.

title: Needs maintenance.
desc: Our bathroom was in poor condition & needs a renovation. Staff were excellent, but the building is looking a bit run down and could use some maintenance. The location is excellent and only a short walk to Orchard Road & Orchard MRT.

title: Good location hotel in Singapore
desc: Recommended hotel if you are looking for strategic /nice location within orchard , but room is quite old , need to up-grade the bathub . the quality of food is so so , not so tasty , mostly a bit plain .

title: Nice Location & Value for Money
desc: The hotel is located in the heart of the Shopping Area, Orchard Street with access to various Malls and Shopping Centres around the hotel. Great access to all kind of Public Transport including Bus & Metro. Friendly Staff, Clean & Comfortable Rooms, Quality Food and Good Enough Amenities including Gym & Swimming Pool.

title: Repeated stay
desc: It was overall a beyond okay experience. Stayed at this hotel almost every visit to singapore. Would like to get more benefits from repeated customers. However, the restaurant needs some service improvement. As we ordered and waited for more than 30 mins to ended up with wrong order. But manager decided to give us free meal as we have to catch up with late doctor appointment

title: Please repaint the building and always check the water pressure at all rooms because sometimes not good
desc: So by far york hotel is good and friendly for family staying. Very near to hospital and the orchard road. So if we stayed for medical reason or just holiday for family trip, its very highly recommended.

title: Singapore stay
desc: A very comfortable hotel, the staff very friendly and obliging and great location to Orchard Rd! It was quite hot & humid so have a good size pool to swim in and sit around to relax was a bonus. All staff were very friendly and the White Rose restaurant had a good selection of food from Asian to Western.

title: York with family
desc: Very happy to stay at york hotel singapore, very near to orchard road with very affordabel price. There are many shop near the hotel like lucky plaza, paragon, and many more shop. Next time we will stay at york again

title: Old Hotel need much more renovation and services
desc: Very old hotel need much more renovation and better services as well as staff to serve the guess. Shower drain stuck, bed smelly, old carpet floor and much more facilities need to be replace. Will not stay at this hotel anymoore, though we're old customer.

title: York Hotel
desc: Good location, kind staff, good breakfast, swimming pool, comfortable room conditions, good air conditioning operation, quiet room conditions, good viewing, good bed conditions, warm water flow, etc.,

title: When stayed at YORK Hotel Singapore
desc: We had a good experience when staying at YORK Hotel Singapore. Maybe your property need some renovation. Overall the location and the services is good. I would like to recommend this property to my family or friends.
